11131112.content:
Just as they were proceeding in the next plate offered by the tribesmen, Sam first, and after a bit also Dean, noticed that a figure more heavily clad than the others was coming to meet them.

The figure was wearing a mantle made with the skin of some kind of panther, while wearing on his head a cap made with the feathers of birds of various shapes and sizes. The two brothers stood still for a moment, watching as the figure walked toward them, before Dean erupted in a loud belch and returned to his eating. Sam didn’t quite like that.

“Come on, Dean…Stop acting like a pig.”

“Please, please, Honored guests. Be calm. There is no offence to be seen. We are glad that you enjoy the bounty of Mother Earth. I’m Rakhar, I’m the shaman of this humble village. I speak the language of your people.”

The figure spoke calmly with a firm and yet soothing voice, as it moved closer to the thrones where the two had been placed by the tribesmen and left to eat for the previous week. The shaman then bowed his head low as he murmured to the two.

“Please, do not be alarmed. I’ll now perform a ritual for my people. Alas, they’re not as educated as me I the ways of the New World. Please, have patience and then, I’ll answer all of your questions.”

As he said that he stood up suddenly, as he began to perform a series of moves, as if he was dancing and moving like a bird on land. As he did so he also touched both brothers, feeling their paunches and how well their bodies were toned, if at all. As the shaman oved and danced, Sam watched entranced, while Dean simply stared, while eating still.

When the show was over, all the tribesmen shouted the word “Koud” and then simply turned away and returned to their previous duties. Some of them went hunting, others back to their gardens, and a few kept bringing more platters of food to the brothers sitting on the thrones.

“I thank you again for your patience, Honored Guests. I, Rakhar, will answer any question you have. “

As Dean seemed to be engrossed with cleaning out his current platter, Sam took the word, while still eating from his current dish.

“We had come I these parts seeking for a…a monster. Yes. Something that is not usually seen. We are FBI agents, from the united states tracking this monster down. Er, if you could help us to find this monster, we would be grateful. Also, why this food and why keep calling us Honored Guest? Not that I’m offended by that…”

“Well, I have no clue to what this 'ef bi ai' might be but from what you say you are warriors, am I correct?

I will ask around in the village and we will help as much as we can to find about this monster. The food and the title is since my people have met few of your kind so you are almost as deities to them. Plus, is our tradition that guest have to be treated with all honors during the time of ‘Rakhaneschu’…it is a feast for the abundance to the village.

We will be glad and happy to have you here if you wish to stay.”

At that, Dean, that had been silently gorging on the food, piped up.

“How long will it be?…*urp*…and about the food…”

The shaman bowed low toward them once more as he made a sign to his people nearby, as they scurried away, returning moments later carrying big platters of roasted animals of various shapes and sizes.

“Rakhaneschu will last for three more weeks. It would be great dishonor if you were to leave us now. Many would be offended, I believe. Food will be brought to you and, when you will want, we will be happy to let you indulge in the beauty of our village.
Now, please, enjoy…”

As the villagers brought forth more dishes, Sam launched a glare at his brother, which answered back with ease.

“Come on, you wouldn’t want to offend them? They will search te demon for us and refusing a gift isn’t nice, Sam. Relax and enjoy something for once.”

“Maybe you’re right, Dean. Still, try to keep it down. You’re looking chubby there…”

“Nah, it’s just bloating…will pass.”

As the two kept eating, so the villagers kept bringing. Dishes full of delicacies reached the two hunters and, after a few minutes, were brought away empty as more full dishes were brought forward. Both brothers soon lost themselves again to the taste of the delicacies they were being showered with. Between them Dean seemed to be the faster but, Sam too was able to eat for longer.

Soon enough, the villagers began to bring different plates to the two brothers.

Dean found himself having, more and more often, platters with massive portions of meat and fruit, often followed by casks of a strange, and yet tasty, purple drink. Sam, instead, had noticed that what he was getting most where bowls of stew and soup, with a soft and yet very tasteful bread.

As they both kept eating, so they started growing anew. Already Dean was getting stuck in his throne like chair more often than before, while Sam noticed that he could barely see his own feet.

The shaman smiled widely watching the two men eating so much and with such appetite.

“Oh yes, the older one sure is greedy. We will enjoy him very much and very soon. The other one has better capacity. But need to be greedier. HE will grow well under our tutelage.

Dearest brothers and sisters…” he then said turnig to the villagers surrounding him “We will treat our guest with all honors, letting them to grow big and fat for us…so that we will be able to offer them to Koud when they will be good and helpless.

And the Great God, Koud The Devourer, will grant us a Grand feast with them…I’m sure of it!”
11131112.title: Shaman arrival

choices: The brothers wanted to rest after such a delightful meal

111311122.content:
Although Sam was a little jealous that Dean seemed to be the one getting the meats and fruits, Sam couldn't deny how delicious the soups were. The balance and texture of it were amazing and it was just right to eat not too hot and not too cold. Of course, unlike his brother has wasn't a savage when he was eating. He took his time and slurped it with delight. This food made by the natives here was superior to all the times' Sam and his brother had to stop take fast food joints to get something to eat. The meat and vegetable flavors mixed well into the liquid of the soup. The bread was delectable as well it wasn't hard or anything, it was like eating a cloud. Sam was lost in a haze of bliss as he continued to eat. Sam had never let himself go like this but he was loving it, after living such a brutal lifestyle just being able to have a day of decadence was nice.

*RIPPPP*

Sam came out of his haze of pleasure after hearing an awful sound, it sounded like something was tearing. he thought his brother Dean ripped his pants or something but as he looked to his brother he saw Dean looking at him with a smirk. Sam wasn't sure why but has he looked down he saw his shirt was starting to rip, revealing his tan flesh pouring out of his shirt. Sam instantly blushed to a bright red embarrassed how he had ripped his shirt. His shirt had split on his lower belly unable to contain his weight anymore.

"Man seems like it snuck up on you" Dean teased.

"Shut up Dean," Sam said as he tried to cover the rip. He couldn't believe that he had eaten so much that his shirt had ripped. Sam looked over to Rakhar who was still watching over them, "Sorry I just have seemed to rip my shirt" Sam said trying to be polite.

Rakhar chuckled. "Please Sam you have no need to apologize, we consider it to be a compliment that you enjoy our food so much," the shaman said with a soft smile.

"Oh man this stuff is delicious" Dean said as he continued stuffing his face which Sam only rolled his eyes.

Rahaka couldn't wait to see how the brothers turned out once they expanded with fat.

114333132131311313333123223.content:
Darren moved swiftly toward the three chubby men, trying as much as he could to not stare too longly at their fattening bodies.

'Lord, they sure are growing but, they aren't big enough yet.'

"Good Morning h estimate guests, I hope your vacation here is going well. I just wished to inform you that, since it has been already three weeks since you arrived, the management decided to offer you a loyalty reward for being here with us until now, hoping that you will stay here even longer. In a few minutes some of our staff will come and assist you to collect your prizes."

As Darren left, the three men couldn't contain their excitement.

"Man! This place has to be the best in the world, wouldn't you agree guys?"

Said Joey, smiling, as he kept munching on a cookie taken from a bowl at his side.

"Yeah! Best vacation ever! *Mphm*...It's so good I don't want ever to leave..."

Mumbled Chandler as he kept munching on the chicken wings his robot was feeding him.

"*Urp* Heck yeah. Joey, can't stop thanking you for taking us with you!"

As the three kept eating, three beautiful girls entered the pool, each of them was scantily clad and moved with grace toward the three guest, helping them standing as they started to guide them toward their 'Loyalty awards'.
A short moments later, the three girls led the guys to a vast hall chocked full of balloons and banners, on which there were printed the names of the three guests. The girls, though, didn't stop there and guided forward the three americans each toward a table dedicated only to them, not so close that they could touch each other, but neither so distant that they couldn't talk between themselves.

Suddenly, from behind a column, emerged the figure of Facilier, as sh addressed the three chubby guys, with a smile plastered to her face, as she did her best to not lick her lips too hungrily.

"Joey, Chandler, Ross, we wanted to show you our pleasure in having you all here in our resort and so we decided to prepare a party for you guys.
And to show you how good it feels to have you here, at the end of the party, we will also give you three an award.

Now, enough talking...and let's start partying!"


With that said the woman clapped her hands and from behind her appeared some other beautiful girls, each bringing within their arm a large, golden, cloche plate. as they arrived beside each of the guys they opened the cloche and left the plate full of food in front of the guests.

Joey looked at his plate and couldn't believe at what he was seeing. In front of him rested a large platter with the biggest hamburger he had ever seen. it was easily as wide as his open hand and he saw that there were at least three big patties inside, along with melted cheese and various strips of bacon. As he stared at it, he could feel his hunger, fueled by weeks of excessive meals, demanding him to eat that thing as fast as he could.
At the same time, Chandler, took a good look at what the girl had left in front of him. At first he was envious of Joey but, as he saw the large bowl full of fried chicken, covered in barbecue sauce, with at the side a smaller, but not by much, bowl of onion rings he licked his lips in anticipation. Last, but not least, Ross received his plate and he too began drooling at the sight of his course. On his plate was resting a very large square of lasagna, within it he could see the cheese, the meat and the sauce all mixed together to perfection. So enthralled he was by it that he couldn't stop himself from sniffing it, enjoying its aroma.

Facilier words suddenly brought the guys back to the real world.


"No need to wait, dear guests. This celebration has just started!"


With that said the three Americans began eating in earnest, each of them enjoying the flavor of his own dish. Joey, began taking big bites out of his burger, munching and, quickly, swallowing each load, loving the fact that the bun was so compact and meticulously prepared that not even a drop of sauce fell from it. Ross also had started to cut his lasagna in smaller pieces, eating them as fast as he could. After the first bite he felt in heaven and, if he only could, would have taken the entire thing within his mouth so good it was.
Chandler, instead, had decided to go whole hog with his chicken and, without caring of the grease covering his hands, he started to tear as much meat as he could from his plate.

Enjoying themselves immensely the guys made a quick work of the plates they had received and the room began to fill with the sounds of their appreciation.

But, as Facilier had said, that was only the beginning.

Soon after they had cleaned their plates, more girls began arriving toward them, each of them bringing forth a new deluge of treats for them to consume, and that they did. Plate after plate, course after course, the three guys kept eating, enslaved by how good those plates were.

And it showed. Each of them was now sporting a good sized potbelly, slowly filling up with tastier and tastier food. Facilier enjoyed the view of the three porker growing, still she knew that soon, due to how heavy were those dishes, they were going to stop. But she couldn't have any of that.

Sure, the three of them had grown chubby since their arrival but the yearly festival of her people was due by the year's end and she needed the three guest of honor to be in Full shape for that time.
Taking aside one of the waitresses, she explained to her to start using that 'spice' on the next dishes they were going to serve.
The girl gave back a quick nod, while smiling widely, showing her own pure white teeth.

Chandler, meanwhile, was caressing his own tight packed belly, while burping in one of his hands. He had never eaten so well and still, he was beginning to feel full. After his chicken fried feast he had devoured a large steak with fries, he still could feel the meat melting in his mouth, a seemingly small mountain of chicken nuggets and some delicious deep fried sausages in various sauces, loving every minute of it. He had loved it so much that, even though he was feeling full-ish, he didn't want to stop.

Ross and Joey were in similar positions, both had eaten a massive amount of food, but instead of feeling sickeningly full, they both were enjoying so much that they wanted more. Joey, while massaging his stomach, kept recalling the delicious oversized hot dogs or the massive portion of burger-lasagna he had just wiped out. Similarly, Ross, was recollecting of the large pasta dish he had received at some point. It had been so full of cheese, cream, eggs and bacon that he had loved every bite of it.

Their thoughts were suddenly interrupted when three more plates were brought to them.

The guys, even though were wishing to continue, started to feel full and were worried that this marvelous feast could soon become a nightmare if they kept at it.

Facilier smiled at them, knowing full well the effects of the spice she had ordered to apply to the plates, and tried to goad them to eat some more. She knew that they were getting full, it was enough to check their full tummies to know it but, she also knew that if they brought the spice within their systems everything would have changed.

The spice in fact was a...
114333132131311313333123223.title: Celebrating the loyal guests

choices: The three friends decide to have one last meal before going to bed
Ross, Chandler and Joey decide to go to the gaming room
Darren decide to 'spice' things up a bit for the three growing guys
1143331321313113133331232231.content:
Facilier smiled as she saw Joey getting a bite out of the big bacon burger that he had just received and her smile got wider and wider when she saw also Ross and Chandler getting on with their plates. The spice she had ordered to be mixed in the plates was a natural appetite stimulant and that would ensure that the three men would surely keep eating a little bit more, before stopping.
Sure, she wasn't going to give them more of it that same night, for as it gave hunger, it didn't have any healing property toward the digestive tract, but every once in a while she knew could give it to them.

For the following hour and half the three guys kept shoveling food down their throats as if they were starving and, from their point of view, they surely were.

Joey, as soon as he had swallowed the first bite of his bacon burger, felt himself ravenous. His hunger seemed to spike out fo the blue, but he was too under it to wonder the why's of it. He simply inhaled the bun he had in his hands and eagerly started on his next course, which was rapidly delivered by one of the waitresses, as he sent a glance toward his friends.

They weren't in a much different position.

Chandler had just given a small bite to the chicken drumstick that one of the waitresses had brought him when he felt himself compelled to eat more. Like an animal he began cleaning drumstick after drumstick, his lips and cheeks getting covered in grease, while one of the girls stood at his side cleaning him every time she could without interrupting his frenzy. Ross instead, as soon as he had swallowed the small forkful of Fettucine alfredo's felt a strange taste in his mouth but, any thought related to that got overruled by the hunger he felt growing within himself.

As the time passed, each of them began slowing down. Even though they were still feeling peckish, each of them was stuffed as their full, and taut as a drum, bellies could prove.

"Woah...*Urp*...Can't believe how much I ate...'t was good though."

Chandler mumbled by himself as he kept burping and belching, trying to relieve some pressure from his lead ball of a stomach. Ross and Joey agreed whole heartedly as they too tried to relieve some pressure, while the waitresses cleared their tables and, after that, returned to their side to massage their stuffed bellies. In all of this, Facilier, had seemingly disappeared, as she had consumed her own small meal, but quickly returned when the guests were being massaged by the beautiful girls at their sides.

"I hope the dinner was up to your tastes, honored guests."

Ross answered for all, as he saw that the other two were way too taken with the massage.

"Oh yeah. Never, ever, have eaten such good plates. Almost wish it could be like this at every meal..."

"Well..." said Facilier with a smile "...I think that it can be arranged, if that is your wish."

"Awe-*Urp*-Awesome!" shouted Joey with excitement in his voice.

"Now, though..." started again the woman "It's time for your rewards! My husband, Mazu, will give them to you right away.
Mazu?"

From the end of the hall a set of double doors opened and in entered Mazu, followed by Darren and by one of the waitresses. The three of them had each an object within their arms but, as it was covered with a sheet, it wasn't possible to understand what it was.

Mazu stepped forward, taking the word and addressing the three Americans.

"As my wife has said, we thank you deeply for your presence here. We're honored to have you all here with us and we hope you'll want to stay as much as you want. But enough of that, I am here because we have a gift for each of you."

He motioned to the waitress to move, and she did so until she was at the side of Ross.

"For you Ross, we have decided to assign to your persona one of our own waitresses. She'll be at your side to pamper you and to assist in your every whim, for all the time you'll be at our resort."

The girl then took out the sheet and revealed a glass case containing some kind of remote, which she swiftly gave it to Ross.

"With that remote..." contined Mazu"...Ross, you'll be able to call for her assistance whenever you need, at whatever time you'll need her."

Ross gave a look of uncertainty toward the girl, which just blushed and whispered in his ear.

"My name's Suzana, it's a pleasure to assist such a good man"

While Ross began to blush beet red, Mazu turned toward Joey.

"Joey, For you we decided to give you something you may have desired since arriving here. Darren, if you would?"

Darren walked toward Joey and, when he was at his side, revealed the content of the box he was holding. Inside there was a simple looking pin. As Joey took it in his hand it began to glow and a mechanical figure emerged from behind his table.

"That, Joey, is F33-DR, but we simply call him Chef. We saw how excited you were with Chandler robotic assistant and so we all agreed to provide you with a similar model for your own use. He'll be always ready to answer any of your calls at any time."

Joey, even though was still enjoying the massage, couldn't refrain himself from raise his arm and shout in joy.

"Oh Yeah! Thanks!"

Now Mazu finally turned toward Chandler, which seemed to be envying his two friends, but also quite excited at the prospect of his own incoming gift.

"Chandler, for you we have discussed long and hard on what to give you. We wanted to show you our appreciation and so we hope that this will suit your tastes."

As Mazu spoke, he also moved forward and extracted a little remote from the box he was holding. As soon as Mazu used the remote, Chandler heard a light whirring sound and actually saw the floor giving away from him. At first he began to feel scared until he realized that the chair he was own wasn't a normal chair but a floating one. Suddenly excited he began looking at the hundreds of buttons that began to appear on the handles until he just smiled in happiness toward Mazu.

"Dear guests" Facilier took word moving to stand by Mazu "We hope you enjoyed this celebration and we wish for you all a wonderful rest of the day.

Also, I just spoke to our personnel in the kitchens. As you asked, from now on, all of your meals will be arranged as they were for this celebration."

As the three friends walked/waddled away, helping themselves with their gifts, Facilier, Mazu and Darren moved closer to each other.

"Such a good idea you had, dear wife."

"Thanks Mazu, Between the gifts we have given them, the spice that we will use from now on and the every day multi courses meals, they will sure fatten up until they reach the right size for the Yearly Festival."

"Uncle? Aunt? How big do you think they'll get?"

"As big as we can make them" Facilier answered "But we need to keep them stuffed, in the dark and as lazy as they can be."

Meanwhile, as night time approach...

It was another day on set of Fuller house, and Michael Campion, who plays the teen son "Jackson" was approached by the director for the next episode.

"So listen here, today will be a eccentric episode, to bring in new viewers of a particular taste"

"okay...what are we doing?" michael asked

(time passes)

So on set for the episode "begins", see in actually this "epsiode" is for the director's own amusement and is set in a whole new location and a new cast for the episode for his enjoyment for what he has planned.

“Jackson!” Jim called over. “So glad you could make it.” “Hello, Mr. Ryan.” Said Jackson . “Did I get here early or something?” “Not at all. In fact, you’re right on time. Please, sit anywhere you like.” “When is everyone else supposed to get here? I thought this was an audition.” Jackson asked. “Oh, yes. Good news! I’ve decided I’d prefer you for the role I had in mind.” “Really?!” Exclaimed Jackson. “That’s great! What’s the role, exactly?” “In due time. In the meantime, eat your fill. You’ll need to put on some pounds for this role.” The two looked at each other uncertainly and began to peruse their options.
“I have to say, you have such a trim figure. I’m almost jealous.” Jim said with a slightly mischievous tone. “Thank you?” Jackson said confused. Jackson exchanged some perplexed glances over this sudden comment on his appearance. “Looks like that’s a thing of the past. Keep eating.” Jim said with a smirk. The boy continued eating plate after plate, but began to slow down, eyes watering in discomfort. Finally, he leaned back in his chair, belly round and distended. “Ugggh.” Jackson moaned in discomfort. “I can’t eat any more.”
Jim’s eye twitched in annoyance. “You can’t stop now. You can’t stop until you eat everything on that table.” He said sternly. The boy’s eyes widened in shock, looking at the veritable mountain of food that still lay before them. The buffet was enough to feed well over 20 people! “I can’t eat that much!” Cried Jackson. “I thought you really wanted the part. This is to show me you’re committed. Now eat. Once that table is cleared, we can discuss your role.” Jackson exchanged some looks and reluctantly went back to eating, doing his best to ignore their aching stomachs. After just one more plate, he recoiled and grabbed his throat, caustic bile welling up and threatening to come spilling out. Swallowing, he leaned back in his chairs and took a few ragged breaths, only just barely having avoided throwing up all over the table.

choices: Convince him to stop training, getting him to become lazier

Stage an accident and have him sustain an injury
Try to bring his family into the ruse
1241111.content:
James Podrick had distinctly changed many players in his career, moving from club to club he had managed to bring down many champions form their top form to become his top meals. Yet, due to his natural charisma, his leadership skills and his trustworthy appearance, he had never been caught or been suspected of anything when those players shamed themselves on the field.

Making them easy prey for him to consume.

Therefore, his reputation increased, even without producing any notable progress in the teams he worked for. Now that he had the possibility to catch one of the most famous players in the world, he wouldn’t miss it for anything. Quickly he had arranged a meeting with the team owners of Cristiano’s team and had been granted to train the team, with the small clause that he could focus on one of them if the case was to arise.

As he sat in his office, looking through the reports of each player, he quickly fished out the file of Cristiano Ronaldo and scanned it for any bit of useful information. The person was a mean killing machine, the perfect soccer player and yet, he had to bring him down.

Then James had an idea, The idea.

He worked tirelessly the entire afternoon to put in motion his plan, by making calls, by spreading false information and even coming down to directly bribe some important people. In the end he had everything staged and ready to go.

He was going to change the dietary plans for Cristiano.

The following day an insane number of medical reports was going to be issued by the medical section of the team owner’s company. Each and any of these reports were going to prove that Cristiano was in a severe health condition, that he was so malnourished that in a few months his organism could simply collapse under the stress. Then he, James, was going to be chosen to make sure that Mr. Ronaldo followed through with the new diet to balance his condition before it was too late.

Of course everything was a complete lie, even the diet was going to be prepared by him, and he for sure was going to pump his new meal-to-be full of countless calories.

The following day events progressed just as James predicted. It was a day full of shouting, of people phoning other people, of experts being called and of proofs being verified. But in the end, as the day progressed to its end, he received a call from the CEO of the team’s company, granting him full power to manage and ‘restore’ Cristiano well-being.

On the following day, James called Cristiano to his office. He knew the player wasn’t happy about those reports, Cristiano openly said that those were complete lies but, within himself he was scared that it could be true.

“So Cristiano, I think you know why I called you here?”

“It’s about yesterday, isn’t it? Man, I can’t believe it. I feel fine. I don’t feel ‘malnourished’!”

“I know you do. To be completely sincere I don’t think this will last long. Still, no harm in play along for a bit? If it’s a lie, as you said, you’ll just have lost a few days…but if it’s true, then you’ll have the upper hand, don’t you think?”

Cristiano thought deeply about this and had to admit that his coach was right. What had he to lose? At worst, he would have to spend a few more days in the gym.

“Yeah…Yeah I get you. Ok. So, what’s the plan?”

“Simply put, they have sent me your new dietary plan. Therefore, I’ll follow you at meal times, and whenever you need me, so that I can give living proof that everything is going on as they asked. Don’t worry, everything will settle down. You’ll see.

Now come, since we are both here we can start already. The earliest we start, the earliest we finish.”

James began to lead Cristiano to the mess hall of the training facility they were in, where a full team of chefs were already hard at work in making sure that whatever Cristiano was going to order, he was going to get it at the best of their abilities.
James led Cristiano to a table and told him to wait him there as he went to speak with the man at the counter.

“Hi, I’m James Podrick, Cristiano’s coach. I’m here to make sure he follows the proper nutrition as per his medical records. So, since it’s almost lunch time I would say that you can prepare a couple of things for him.

Here, let me show you…”


A few minutes later, as Cristiano and James were idly chatting at the table, a waiter arrived and left some platters right in front of the player, uncovering them and quickly moving back toward the counter in wait.

Cristiano stared wide eyed at the food he had received.

There, in front of him, there was a big plate of macaroni and cheese, with a heavy looking sauce coating the whole plate, then there was a slightly larger platter with a large steak, almost two inches of height, with a conspicuous amount of fries and fried bacon as a side dish. But there was also a last plate with a seemingly small-ish slice of devil’s food cake and a large bottle of soda, should he feel thirsty.

“What!? You’ve gotta be kidding me…This is my lunch?”

“Remember Cristiano, what have you to lose? You can fight against it and people might find that suspicious…or you could just do as they say and if something doesn’t go as planned, you’ll have the upper hand. Plus, a break from all those skimpy meals doesn’t sound good?”

“Uhm. Didn’t thought about that. Thanks, Coach! Man, I don’t think I’ll get used to these massive portions, though…”

Cristiano then grabbed his utensils and began scooping up the rich and heavy pasta, softly moaning from the rich taste at each of his bites. It didn’t take long for him eat most of the pasta but, in the end he had to stop from cleaning his plate, as he moved toward the steak.

Once more, as morsel after morsel found its way into his mouth, he couldn’t stop from moaning in pleasure. The steak was perfect, neither too cooked nor too raw, it simply seemed to melt on his tongue. Same thing happened with the fries, which he covered in lots of ketchup and mayo, blinking toward James who watched him raptly, finishing then with almost clearing all of the bacon.

Burping in pleasure, Cristiano stopped for a bit, as he massaged his bloated stomach with one hand, as he felt all that food rest peacefully in his belly. With a few minutes rest, he finally brought closer the slice of cake and once more the taste almost overwhelmed him. It was so rich, and yet so tasty and light that he found himself wishing idly for a little bit more as he realized he had practically inhaled it.

“Wow…*Urp!*…Oof, ‘scuse me, Coach.”

“Don’t worry. So, how was everything?”

“Utterly perfect, Man. So good…Will I eat like this at every meal?”

“Well, yes. Mostly. Think you can manage for a while?”

Cristiano grinned to James, as he patted his full, slightly bloated, belly.

“I don’t think I’ll get used to it but, Ok. I’ll bite.”

As the days began to pass, so James kept close watch on Cristiano as he began his descent into the hedonistic pleasure of gluttony. Still, even though he began eating much more than he had ever done, the guy was still working out in the gym and performing training and exercise on the field and so the changes in his body weren’t so visible as James had hoped.

“It’s not good. If he keeps working out, he’ll never become tastier. Need to have him to stop for a bit. He has to slow down…Or maybe would be better to just increase the numbers of meals he’ll have to consume?

Mmh…must think on it.”
1241111.title: Upgrading the diet of a soccer player

choices: Cristiano wants to go play outside
Ronaldo toward the Bar for a drink
Let's check what activities there are...
12411111.content:
James had reached a conclusion, it didn’t matter how much Cristiano ate every day if he just kept working out in the gym and on the field. For that reason he had to stop altogether. That, along with the heavily caloric meal plan he was on, would surely fatten him up good. James rapidly took the phone and began making a series of calls.

“Hello, I need to speak with Mr. Clarkson, the deputy CEO. Yes I’ll wait on the line. Hey Frank, yes, it’s me. I need to call in that favour…”


“Cristiano? Can I speak to you in private?”
“Sure Coach. ‘Sup guys? See you later!”

As Cristiano left the team and reached James he was still sweating a little from the exercise session he had on the field.

“So Coach? What’s the matter? I’m following the meal plans as ordered…”
“I know you do, Cristiano. But…”
“But what?”

“You see…” Here James did his best to appear as if he had been ordered to do something he hadn’t agreed on.

“Well, the Administration team of the Company thinks that having you sowing on the field could provide a ‘Marketing Apocalypse’, as they said, if you were to collapse. For that they’ve instructed me to ‘ask’ you to take it easy on the training for a few days.”

Cristiano grew angrier by the minute as he understood where James was going with his request.

“What!? They’re still yapping about those health reports? Man, I’m fine!”
James quickly brought one hand on the shoulder of the player, encouraging him.
“I know how you feel and I tried my best to let them understand but…”
“But those wussies think only of the money…I know I can count on you Coach. So, what I have to do now?”
“Basically they’re asking you to take a two week long vacation in an hotel they’ve provided, without performing any kind of physical exercise. Naturally, I’ll come with you to help you and be there if you need me. Who knows, maybe you will see that it can’t be as bad as you think?”

“Coach…Thanks. Sheesh…some people really believe anything, uh?”
“Yes they do, Cristiano. They totally do.”
Said James as he grinned like a cat with a cornered mouse.

A couple days later, Cristiano and James were in the fancy resort provided by the company, which in turn had received the suggestion from one of their own, who was secretly on the pay check of James Podrick.

James had chosen very carefully the place where he had to keep Cristiano for those two weeks. After all, he had only this chance to change the soccer player to turn him in the sluggish and lazy glutton he needed. The resort was located on a private property island in the Mediterranean Sea, near the coast of Greece. Moreover, most importantly, it catered to only a certain set of people; those who were in the fetish commonly known as Feederism.
Here, in this resort, James was sure that he was going to be able to turn Cristiano from the fit player he was to what He really needed him to be.

A delicious, fattened, meal.


“So, Coach, what I’m supposed to do here?”
“Well, Cristiano, you could go and take some tan on the beach, or maybe do some sightseeing around the place. I have heard from one of the girls at the counters that every day there countless activities and shows to have around here. As long as you don’t exercise and you keep on following the schedule they’ve given you, I don’t think there will be any problems. ”

“Mh-mh…”

Cristiano didn’t sound too convinced but, he wasn’t there for his desire. Still, the idea of having nothing to do for two weeks was new to him and so, as first thing he decided to just relax and enjoy his first day there.

“Alright, Coach. I’m gonna just try to rest a bit for now. Could you, please, ask them to send me my lunch here?”
“Will do, Cristiano. I’ll be back in a few.”

As the soccer player seated on the bed watching some TV, James went out of the room and called for the room service.

“Hi, I’m Coach Podrick. Yes, the guests of the luxury suite. Yeah, I wanted to ask you to bring up to our room one of your own Lunch Combo Special meals.
Yes. No, the other guests isn’t…affiliated so to speak, I’m sure you understand.
Okay, thanks. We’ll be waiting.”

Some fifteen minutes later, just as James was going to call back the kitchen, the waiters brought inside the suite, right next to the bed where Cristiano was laying, a couple of trolleys. With an efficiency that James had rarely seen, the two waiter girls quickly placed all the food on a mobile tray so that Cristiano could eat without leaving the bed.

“Here you go, Sir. As per instructions received from your company representative, we’ve got here your lunch. Please, enjoy.
If you are in need of anything else, don’t hesitate to call us.”

Cristiano suddenly found himself surrounded by a plethora of food. In the past few days he had gotten used to eat a little bit more on the heavy side and so he didn’t said anything aloud but, he could see that the people here had been forewarned of his coming. There was no way that the meal he had under his nose was something not prepared for him specifically.

James stared with a satisfied glint in his eyes, the place was known to cook on the heavy, and fattening, side of things and the meal they had brought wasn’t short of his expectations. Still, Cristiano didn’t seem to mind as James saw him start the meal without any of usual fuss.

As James watched, Cristiano began on clearing plate after plate, fried shrimps with a sweet, but highly caloric, sauce, then some fried mix with various tasty bits of various fishes. Passing then onward toward the main courses, clearing out bowls of Chinese pork noodles, made extra tasty with heavy addition of oil and grease, then some fruit candy, to freshen the meal, without losing any calorie gained. And finally , dessert, a rather large slice of a strawberry cake.
Everything along with a couple bottles of fine French wine.

As Cristiano cleared out almost everything, he felt completely stuffed and yet, he still couldn’t say that it was starting to feel good to have this kind of diet implemented into his life. Still, as he lay on the bed, caressing his bloated stomach, he began checking the activities of the resort through the digital pamphlet on the television.

James though, had other ideas.

“Uh. Cristiano. Don’t forget why they’ve sent us here…As much as I don’t like it, if They hear that you’ve followed a beach volley tournament here, we’ll both be fired.”
“Urg…*urp*…and so? What should I do then?”
“Why don’t you stay here today, rest a bit, watch some TV…and maybe later on we can go to the arcade. I heard that they’ve got quite a big soccer simulator in there.”
“True? Well…alright…*yawn* I guess I’m getting a little bit sleepy…I guess we can go there…tomorrow…to check it…out…”

Quickly, due to the heavy meal he had just cleared, Cristiano fell asleep on the bed, while James moved closer, as the player was loudly snoring, and began to rub that bloated belly.

“Yes Cristiano. Eat, sleep and do nothing else. I need you to grow more for me.”

The first three days passed uneventful for the duo, James and Cristiano didn’t do much in those days, except for staying in the room and eat, or going to the beach for some tanning and eating. Cristiano began to see the truth in James words, as much as he had loved going to the gym, there was something in staying all day in bed, eating his meals and, occasionally, having a snack.

Truthfully, Cristiano wasn’t having only a few snacks along the day but he was more grazing throughout the entire day. Still as the first week passed away without any incidents, James could see as Cristiano began to act more lazily. Not only he had stopped waking up in the early hours, preferring to rise not before the nine in the morning but he also seemed to grow more apathetic against the world surrounding him.

It was on the fourth day that something seemed to be starting to stir in Cristiano’s mind.
12411111.title: Convince him to stop training, getting him to b...

choices: Toward the end of the last week
Would you like to try some activities?
One evening, Cristiano remain alone with one of the girls
Let's go take some sun on the beach next!
124111111.content:
It was on the fourth day that something seemed to be starting to stir in Cristiano’s mind...

As the player rose from the bed, dutifully munching on a complimentary chocolate bar, he began to clean the dishes and the platters used from the last dinner, away. James quickly intervened, he had to make Cristiano as lazy as possible.

“Cristiano? What are you doing?”
“Uh? Just…just cleaning up a bit…”
“Here, get on the bed and don’t worry. Attendant?”

As soon as James called two beautiful girls entered the suite, one began to clean everything around, while the other moved beside Cristiano, massaging his shoulders and, occasionally, giving him a few pastries to eat.

“You see? It’s their job. You wouldn’t like to steal it from them, would you Cristiano?”

The player, once more comfortable on the bed, began once more to watch the TV, as he kept munching on the pastries that the girl beside him kept on giving im.

“You’re right…Coach. Man…sure is tiring…being here…gotta admit there is something to…just rest.”
“That’s the spirit! Now, rest some more and then I’ll have Dinner brought in.”
“Yup, Coach. *Gulp*…Dinner shounds…sho good…*urp*…”

As the first week passed, James could see he was onto something. Cristiano barely had moved from the bed as he kept eating all of his meals and kept on grazing throughout the days on all the snacks the attendants brought to him. Sometime, just to be bold, James tried to double the player intake during lunch or dinner and the results had been optimistic. The player managed in both cases to clean out almost everything and still he kept on snacking through the day.

James could already see the first effects that this new lifestyle was having on the player. Since Cristiano had dropped the gym and the exercise he was really starting to chub up, his belly now began to droop a little on his tight shorts, giving him a slight muffin top, while his moobs had also begun to bloat up becoming small puffy hills. Overall he was getting chubby but, for James, chubby wasn’t enough.

“Ehi, Coach? I’m putting on weigh or what?”
“Er…what do you mean, Cristiano?”

The soccer player was now checking himself in the mirror and was particularly staring at his torso, noticing the soft layer of pudge he had on himself.

“I mean this Coach…Did I have it already? Man, I’m confused.”

James played it as if nothing was wrong.

“I can’t see anything different. Wait; let’s see from an external opinion. Girls? Do you think my friend here has changed in any way?”

The two attendants, which passed basically all their time in the suite with them, turned and looked meticulously to Cristiano but, both smiled as they answered.

“Sincerely? I just see some guy who could look really great if he wasn’t so thin.”
“Seems just the same. I can’t see anything different…”

“You see, Cristiano? I think you’re just letting your worries getting to you.”
“Y-Yeah…you’re probably right Coach. Anyway, Coach, what about having lunch earlier today? And, about that soccer simulator you told me about, well maybe we can go there tomorrow? I don’t really feel up to it today…”
“E-Earlier lunch?”

James was caught off guard and so answered back questioningly, but the player didn’t seem to worry anymore.

“Yeah…I’m getting hungrier than usually. Must be that I skipped breakfast today…”

Podrick grinned wickedly within himself.
‘Skipped breakfast? But if just today I gave you two times as much as you usually have? Well, if you want more, I’ll give you more’

“No problem Cristiano. It must mean that you’re getting back our strength if you’re getting hungrier… I’ll be right back.”

As James left the room, Cristiano went back on the bed and began once more to do some zapping as one of the attendants fed him donuts.

“Mmmm…so good. Keep ‘em coming babe.”
“Yes, sir. As you wish.”

Meanwhile, James was talking with the kitchen staff.

“Yes, It’s Podrick here. Yeah. No, actually, my friend here is asking for something earlier today. Yes. Yes, I was thinking of two of yours Lunch Combo Special meals and an All Dessert Dream to close the meal.

Yes, I’ll call you back to let you know if it need to be made the new normal from now on. Thanks.”

As James returned inside the room, he smiled as he saw Cristiano. The guy was really becoming an hopeless lazy glutton, just what he needed to be. Still, it was always better to play it safe and so he decided to bring in the game a weapon he had learned to love when it was time to fatten up quickly someone.

“Cristiano, Lunch should be here soon. Meanwhile, why don’t you try one of these health bars…The sponsors guaranteed that they’re the best. ”

Cristiano gladly took the oversized chocolate bar from James and quickly unwrapped it, as he kept muncing on the donuts that the attendant fed him. He looked at the bar for a few second, apparently without noticing how big it was, and as soon as he had swallowed his morsel, he gave a big bite to it.

“Mmh…*gulp*…Damn, Coach! Theshe are good! Tashtiest health bars I’ve ever had…Strange though…I’m starting to getting hungrier…Who cares. They’re health bars, so they’ve got to be good for you, right?”
“Exactly so, Cristiano. Eat as much of them as you want.”

Cristiano began to take bites out of the chocolate bars, but still he kept having mouthful of donuts as well, munching on both the soft texture of the donuts and the delicious flavour of the bar.

Unnoticed, his stomach seemed to bloat out faster than before.

‘Yes, Cristiano. Eat as many as you want. There are enough calories in there to equal a normal meal, and the hunger stimulants that they contain will give you the extra boost you need to grow in the meal I need you to become.’

Right at that moment the doorbell ringed, as the waitresses entered the room with the oversized lunch, easily three times as much food as Cristiano had ever previously had. Yet, the player didn’t seem to find anything wrong in it, as he felt starving, and so literally dived into the food like a beast, beginning to clean each plate they had brought to him. There was only one last dessert to clean out and he would have finished everything, but he didn’t feel up to it.

“Oh man…*urp*…I think I ate too much…Can’t keep on…”

James though had other ideas. He wanted to speed up the process and needed to have Cristiano as fat and lazy as possible at the end of that week.

“Hey, Cristiano? Why don’t you have just one more Health bar? Just to, cleanse the pallet, as they say?”
“I don’t know, Coach…I don’t think I can fit anything else in…”

Before he could finish the sentence, as James had given one of the bars to the girl seated beside the player, she broke a large piece of it and pushed it in the player mouth.

“Eat up, Sir. It’s good for you.”

Cristiano could only swallow but, as he did so and tried to say something, another piece of that chocolate bar was pushed between his lips. As he munched on it he began to feel his belly rumbling for more. Confused he looked at the bloated belly he was sporting toward and at the last dessert that still was under his nose. Burping with satisfaction he quickly motioned to the two girls to keep feeding him.

“You were…right Coach…Must be…hungrier than I thought. Maybe I truly was…malnourished…to begin with. Keep going girls…give me…some more...bars and donuts. I need…to grow healthier…isn’t it right, Coach?”

“I didn’t want to tell you but…Yes Cristiano, I think you are way too thin.”

“Well…*urp*…We will change that…won’t we Coach?”

“You can bet on it. Just follow the plan and you’ll be in your top form again in no time…”

Cristiano smiled at that as he kept eating, deaf to the rumbling of his overworked belly, as it began to bloat out to a gut with a thick layer of fat on it.
124111111.title: Onward to Lazy Gluttony, Cristiano!

choices: Mud massage, spoiled by the girls there...
Soccer simulator, play while doing nothing at all..
Magic shows, let's see a few Fat-Magic tricks!
County Fair booths, Stuff-The-Pig, Feed-The-Whale and many more...
1241111112.content:
What could Cristiano like to do?

He could have some mud massage in the SPA, always surrounded by loving girls bent on spoiling him as much as possible...

Or maybe he could try the Arcade and the Soccer Simulator? Play soccer without having to run and sweating his fat off?

There are also the magic shows, some of the people who attended them said that they really GROW on you...

Or maybe, he would just enjoy a visit to a few booths like those in the county fairs? There are a few that, as they said, could make a REAL man out of you...

Or maybe something else entirely?

So, which activity will Cristiano be exposed to?

The choice is yours...
1241111112.title: What to do? What to do?

choices: Call in some favours from the CEO
Return to the training facility as secretly as possible
Keep Cristiano in the resort for some more time, as the Team keep him on roster
Kidnap him and bring him away!
12411111122.content:
James watched gleefully as Cristiano fattened up in those ten days, lazing in bed all day long, while eating at any moment, had really fattened up quite good the soccer player. IF he had to give an estimate, he would have said that Cristiano now was edging in the two hundred pounds range, more or less. Still, James had to be sure that once returned to the training facility Cristiano kept on with his lazy lifestyle.
To verify that he had already concocted a devious plan.

James had checked the local soccer simulator and had verified that it was just what Cristiano needed in his life. Within the simulator, the player would feel just as if he was on the football field, but without the discomfort of having to move around and all that. If he could make Cristiano addicted to that machine, he could then just purchase it for the soccer player when they were back home and so he could keep on fattening him up while maintain the pretense that the player was still training.

Yes. James had only to convince the now lazy Cristiano to leave the room in which they had arrived a dozens of days ago.

“Cristiano? Cristiano?”

The player was on the bed, staring transfixed at the screen of the TV as the two attendants kept on feeding him, one giving him those health bars, the other stuffing him full of pastries and chocolates. He munched on, as if unaware of what was happening around him. And, James knew, it probably was so.

He had started to call them ‘Cristiano’s Eating Trances’.

At a certain point the soccer player just zoned out and kept on eating whatever it was offered to him, without making any fuss or any complaint, even if his belly was stuffed full of food already.

Nonetheless, James had work to do and so, shushing the girls away he moved closer. He still couldn’t believe how big Cristiano was getting. His whole body had started to round up, growing a thick layer of fat everywhere. Even his arms had begun to form some small bingo wings, as a double chin was forming under his face. His belly then, pooching down over the shorts he was wearing, starting the slow descent toward his crotch, while at the side his muffin top grew larger and larger. And how could he forget about his moobs? For sure he was going to need to wear a brain order to contain them if he ever had needed to run back on the field.

Not that he could run for long, no sir. Not with chunky legs he had developed.
Overall, he had fattened up quite well, but James had to make sure that he kept on fattening up and so had to wake him up from his trance.

“Cristiano? Cristiano!”
“Uh? Wha’? Oh. It’s you, Coach? What’s up?”
“Cristiano, do you want to come with me to chek that soccer simulator we spoke about?”
“Mm..I don’t know, Coach…I just don’t feel it…”
“Well, that is true but, don’t forget that you still need to have some activity throughout the day. This simulator seems the right answer to our problem. Think about it.”
“What do you mean?”
“Well, as of now you cannot play on the field due to this illness that you have right? But, if you don’t practise at all you’ll end up ruining you’re A-game. With the simulator instead…”
“Oh? Oh! I see. Man, that’s…why you’re…the Coach. With that…thing, I can practice…but without… exerting myself…and so I don’t…risk any collateral effect.

That’s cool! Alright, let’s go.”

Naturally, as Cristiano tried to rise from the bed he didn’t manage it on his own. His muscles had slightly atrophied and so he stared confusedly around him as he tried to understand.

“Cristiano, Don’t worry…that’s just the illness that has to be manifesting with its first symptoms. Here, I’ll help you stand.”

After a long trek, during which Cristiano still managed to drown several slushies and even some of his health bars, they finally reached the arcade room and soon, in front of them there was the soccer simulator. It was a large sphere of metal sheets, inside which there was a comfortable looking chair, an helmet with some tubes coming in and out of it, some gloves for the virtual reality immersion and some more gadgets. Quickly, James had Cristiano seated in there, wearing the helmet and the gloves. As a final addition, he placed one of the tubed mask that were linked to the cabin, onto his mouth and nose.

“Now you’re all set to go. The gloves and the helmet will provide you with the audio, vision and touch senses. The mask, obviously, will provide coverage for the last two senses. This way, you’ll fell just as if you’re on the field.
Ready? Go!”

As James started the simulator, Cristiano found himself plunged into a soccer field, with his old body as he began sprinting and playing, running around as he played a mock game with his AI controlled teammate and adversaries.

Outside, instead, James and the two girls could admire Cristiano as he seated comfortably and, at his every movement, how his body fat jiggled this way and that. It was a magnificent show.

“Girls? Have you brought what I’ve asked you to?”

One of the two attendants smiled widely as she showed a small trolley filled with large water flasks full of a brown liquid.

“Of course. We melted as many of those ‘health bars’ as we could and filled them in these bottles. Can we proceed?”
“Please, be my guest. Pour it all in.”

As James kept on watching, the girls began to pour the melted chocolate bars into a nozzle on the side of the simulator, as a meter began to rise showing how much liquid was stored inside the machine. At the same time, the brown colored sludge began to travel inside the tubing of the simulator until it reached the mask attached on Cristiano face.

James stared gleefully as Cristiano began to swallow the heavy caloric, appetite stimulant sludge without any fuss as he kept on playing at the simulator.

“Yes, Cristiano. Enjoy the game…Soon, that will be you only way to be in a soccer field.”

A few hours later, an overstuffed and bloated Cristiano shut off the machine and barely managed to stand from it, as James and the girls quickly gathered around him to help him stand.

“So, Cristiano, how it was?”
“Oh man…Oh, Coach,…that is…awesome! I just… couldn’t stop… your idea was…the best. I really…need to…have one of these…back home.”
“Alright. I’ll call the Company and will make it happen.”
“Thanks man. God, I feel as if I run for hundreds of miles…”
“Well, Cristiano. You did. It was a simulation but you still ran that long.”
“Yeah. Gotta be right…So hungry though….”

James grinned as sent the tired ex-soccer player to return to his room helped by the two girls, as he moved toward one of the help desks of the resort.

“Don’t worry Cristiano. Since your exercise was so harsh, I’ll ask them to send something more tonight.”
“Thanks Coach…so…So Hungry…”

As James saw the three move away, he could clearly see the two girls began feeding Cristiano with the remaining bottles of chocolate sludge, and he drank them all without any care in the world. He, instead approached the young man and began his order for Cristiano’s meals.

“Hi. I’m Coach Podrick. Can I order? Wonderful.
Let’s see…for tonight dinner, is your Humongous Combo Meal the one with the breakfast, lunch, dinner and dessert feast, all in one? Good. Send two of them to our room.

From tomorrow, instead, you can easily triple the current normal order for all of his daily meals.

Yes, that would be all. Thank you.”

‘Oh, Cristiano, I’ll make you huge.’

In those last two days at the resort, Cristiano seemed to blow up with fat.

As he was, almost, always hungry he ate without any break. And as he also spent as much time as he could on the simulator, he felt like he was really exercising and so didn’t find anything strange in the fact that his meals had gotten suddenly huge. Another factor was that since he had accepted the idea of being ill and of having been malnourished up to that moment, he stopped questioning his physical changes.
It wasn’t like he didn’t see them but, more that all those around him told him there weren’t. So he decided that it had to be his mind playing tricks with him, as it was supported from his Coach, who had always been at his side.
He couldn’t be lying, right?

As the final day rolled to a closure, since the following morning the two of them had to return home, Cristiano decided that a celebratory feast was in order and so asked James to order as much food as possible. Very soon, countless trolleys of food entered the room, filling every nook and cranny with food as an oversize Ronald kept on laying on his king sized bed, almost filling a good three quarters of it all by himself.

James was still beside him, admiring his masterpiece.

How Cristiano’s gut now was divided in two large rolls that covered up to his crotch. Or his now very definite triple chin, as it cascaded down on his neck, or his pendulous moobs, so large and puffy that were really gonna need a bra to be kept in check. And what about his ass. What a masterful piece of art. Those two huge, flabby, jiggly mass of ass cheeks Cristiano now had as a rear. James could have sworn that he could have used that ass as a desk for his laptop if so he had wanted.

Yes, Cristiano had transformed hugely in those two weeks but, better yet, he now was ready to be brought to the next level. He was now enough of a lazy glutton to be able to keep on getting fat until he got immobile.

Now, all that mattered was to bring him home and manage to let him stay still on the team roster.

But James already had various aces in his sleeves…
12411111122.title: Playing Soccer without any actual play...

choices: The following day James wants to measure and weigh Cristiano...
Cristiano decide he isn’t growing healtier fast enough…
124111111222.content:
As James and Cristiano moved from the resort, there were some snags bound to happen. Naturally, James tried his best to play in advance and he could compliment himself for a job well done. Foreseeing mobility’s issues with Cristiano, he had enlisted the help of the two resort attendants as if they were personal nurses. And they proved their value as they assisted the overfed soccer player in moving around, boarding the private jet and kept him always stuffed to the brim during the entire duration of the trip.

Another issue arose as soon as they arrived at their destination. As much as they tried to move in secrecy, some journalist had heard the scoop and tried to take a few shots at them. Luckily, James had already hired a decoy, using an actor to imitate Cristiano, thus managing to land the real deal in anonymity.
Finally, as soon as they were in the training center, the last problems already were taken care of.

James had thought that the other team members might victimize Cristiano, if they were to see him, so it was released the news that he was ill and had to follow a harsh regimen of rehabilitation, before being able to join them all on the field. This way, the renovations done to Cristiano’s room were also justified.

Podrick smiled as he and his entourage entered the new rooms of Cristiano.

The bed had been reinforced and enlarged, and a huge television had been added right in front of it with as many channels as possible. The Soccer Simulator also had been installed and upgraded as per James specifications. With a maximum weight tolerance of five tons, it had to be sturdy enough for Cristiano. In addition, just to be sure that his protégé didn’t ever leave his room, a Chef, personally chosen by James, had been hired. So that the guy could be fattened up without any issues.

Everything seemed to be right on par with James plans for Cristiano.

The guy himself didn’t seem to take too much notice in all of the changes, he simply waddled slowly toward the bed, helped by the two girls at his side and, as soon as was there, he relaxed on top of it, huffing and puffing as he had overexerted himself in just walking around for a bit.

“Man…Gotta recover… soon, from this…illness.”
“Don’t worry, Cristiano. I’m sure you will. Now, since it’s almost time, I think we could have an earlier breakfast, but before that don’t forget about your health bars.”

Cristiano, at the mention of food, began to feel a low rumbling from his large gut, as hunger began to manifest itself within him. Yet, even though breakfast was going to arrive soon, he still began to motion to his girls to start giving him a little snack. Both girls, quickly moving on both side of him, began giving him food, alternating between his health bars and brownies. Cristiano ate both moaning in pleasure, as he felt his belly grumble more and more noisily as the hunger stimulants began to have their effect.

It was a few minutes later that the Chef began to bring forward the breakfast platters to Cristiano, which helped himself from those huge platters without realizing how big they were. As he seated on the bed, he moved closer the mobile tray with the first platter, easily covering his own width with its size.

On it he saw that there were almost a dozen peppered egg whites, with a side of thick and heavy fried bacon slices, along with some huge fried sausages, easily the size of a small coke bottle. As He began to ate the meal, the chef, brought forward another platter, placed on a mobile trolley, leaving a second tray chocked full of massive hot dogs, heavily loaded with sauces.

Cristiano simply grunted in acknowledgment, as he began grabbing some of those hot dogs, using them as bread to collect the eggs from his first platter. Useless to say that he soon began to cover his face in grease and other sauces, as the residuals of his meal began to accumulate on his cheeks and on his triple chins. The attendants though were there to clean him up and to push more and more of his health bars, within his mouth whenever they could. Therefore, the overfed player kept on eating, feeling his hunger grow to higher levels at all the times. As he cleaned the first two platters, he began to slightly rub his swollen, bloated gut, burping away freely to ease some more space in there. Still the Chef kept coming, bringing him more to consume.

This time, he placed a vast bowl as close to him as possible, this salad bowl was chocked full of fried chicken pieces, along with even more fried bacon strips. Then he left on a nearby trolley another tray, this time they were burgers, huge five decker burgers, and each patty at the very least two hundred grams of pure pork meat. These were left beside him, as a small pool of grease and oil began to exude of them in the same plate. Yet Cristiano began to scoop them up, taking vast mouthful out of them, enjoying the rich flavor, feeling the grease and oil flow down his chins.

James stood still, enjoying the view. Here he was, watching one of the most proficient soccer player in the world eat himself toward true obesity. Even now, as he imagined him at being almost at three hundred pounds, he still wasn’t content. Cristiano had to grow more before being considered acceptable to become his meal. Yet, he also had to maintain a modicum of pretense in order to appease to what little resistance the player could still bring on.
As the Chef brought forward more tray, each of these loaded with desserts, James moved closer to his pupil.

“Now, Cristiano, enjoy your breakfast but after a well needed nap, remember that you’ve gotta practice some more in the simulator, ok?”

The player just grunted his agreement to that request, as he dived face first in the large assortment of cakes that they had brought to him. As he did so, his belly continued to bloat out more and more, growing more stuffed at each morsel he ate, and yet he kept on eating, careless of what damages he was inflicting upon his figure. When he finally had cleared all dishes, Cristiano was already feeling drowsy. All the food, stuffed in his bloated gut, was already being digested and so he simply fell asleep as the pounds already seemed to appear on his growing body.

A couple of hours later, the girls woke him up softly and, as they helped him stand, they brought him forward toward the simulator.

“C-Coach?”
“Yes, Cristiano?”
“I do…want to…practice but…I’m getting…hungry again…”
“Alright. Don’t worry about that. I’ll ask the Chef to whip up something for you as a mid-morning snack. Now go work out a bit in the simulator.”
“Y-Yeah, Coach!”

As days began to pass by, a sort of schedule began to take form.

They would feed a large pre-breakfast to Cristiano, right as the sun emerged at the horizon, only to let him sleep on it for a couple of hours, waking him up just in time for a hearty breakfast, which would keep him occupied for almost an hour. Then he would nap a bit more and then practice in the simulator, as more desserts and his health bars sludge was fed to him through the machine, right until lunch time. It was then that the Chef would go all out on Cristiano, feeding him a whole seven-course meal, letting him have as many seconds he wished for, keeping him there for at least three hours.

Then it was going to be once more naptime for the over engorged player, until was time for another snack, and right after that some more practice in the simulator. Along with its complementary sludge feeding.

As practice finished, Cristiano would be so hungry that James knew he could keep him eating right up until dinnertime and beyond. Then, right before midnight, after a small nap, they would wake him up once more to fed him an all dessert meal, keeping him eating for as long as he could.

Then it was going to be a new day and the cycle would start all over again.

Along with the schedule, James also reinforced in Cristiano’s mind the idea that for all his practice with the simulator, he was spending precious energies and so had to eat always more than the day before. Cristiano, soon, convinced himself of this and, even when not exercising, he would always request more and more food, thus eating and stretching his stomach every day more.

James kept watching from the sidelines, as he began to detach from the now obese player, as he kept on growing fatter and larger, enjoying how big Cristiano was getting, In just a few days, Cristiano seemed to have grown of at least another hundred pounds, bringing him to a very obese four hundred pounds….
124111111222.title: 00Fat, the secret return of the Overfed Cristiano

choices: Let him keep some mobility to shame him during a match
Take no chances, blob like Cristiano has to become true!
What if he was placed under a ‘Liquid Diet’?
Immobile or mobile? Who cares! Let’s start to tenderize that meat!
1241111112222.content:
Cristiano Ronaldo woke up with a yawn, his sleep interrupted by a growling sound he had become accustomed to hearing. As he woke up, he slowly began the arduous task of placing himself against the bed stand. It never dawned on him that it shouldn’t have been such a hard task to perform. Still, by pushing with all his might (for what strength he still had), he managed to place his back vertically, reaching a seated position on the bed. Yet, he was now left tired and covered in sweat, as he wasn’t used anymore to exert any kind of exercise.

But as tired and hungry he was, help was right beside him as one of the two ‘personal nurses’ was right beside him, with a large platter filled with donuts and pastries.

“Good Morning Sir, here have some of your pre-breakfast.”

Cristiano didn’t even reply, he simply opened his mouth and began eating away at whatever he was receiving. The nurse, Nastassja, was enjoying the presence of the fattened-up player. She had accepted that job because she knew that he had the potential of becoming one of the biggest. She had enjoyed working in the Resort, the possibility to be around feeders and feedees, to be there watching them grow and be stuffed was something she loved but, they always left after a while.

So, when Coach Podrick had asked her and her colleague to join him she accepted at the condition of being able to stay at Cristiano’s side forever. Nastassja was brought back from her reverie when she heard a pitiful whining just beside her, looking down she realized that Cristiano had already cleared out the platter and was whimpering from hunger.

“Now, now, Sir, it isn’t over yet…”

She simply placed the empty platter on the floor and quickly took a second one from a nearby trolley, starting once again to push more food into Cristiano, as he began to fall into his eating trance once more.

James watched from afar, through one of many hidden cameras he had placed in the room. He spied on Cristiano, watching as he kept on eating and growing fatter. It had been already a week since they returned from the Resort, and yet the player had never said anything against the deluge of goodies that everyone around him kept pushing on him.

James smiled wickedly at the thought that soon the player was going to be shamed publicly and, as soon as he was going to be left alone, He could swoop him up and do with him as he pleased.

Podrick licked his lips as he imagined the massively obese Cristiano slowly roasting in a pan, prepared just as if he was a Thanksgiving turkey. Yet, the obese soccer player could still grow more and so he brought those thoughts back into the deepest part of his mind. As he resumed watching Cristiano standing up and preparing himself for the, almost only, exercise he kept on doing.

Standing, while kept upright with the help of the two nurses, Cristiano looked even bigger than he was.

His face had softened to the point that his cheeks seemed to be stuffed with small balls, his three chins were almost constantly jiggling, as a fourth one began to make its appearance. His moobs, huge globular sack of fat, fell blobbily on his chest, slowly moving to either side of him, pushed away by his ever-growing gut.

And what a belly it was.

Divided in three belly rolls, it truly was an apron of a gut, covering his man part and, lately, starting to reach for his knees. His belly button was deep and wide, it could almost suck two fingers within itself. His hips had also grown wider, other than fatter, forcing him to waddle slowly to avoid, as much as possible, to chafing his thighs.

Yes, Cristiano had truly reached a new level of obesity and Podrick saw confirmation in this when he checked the scale hidden inside the bed through the laptop he was using within his private room.

‘6-8-4 ’

Six hundred eighty-four pounds of ex soccer player.

James felt his head spinning as he read that three-digit number. Cristiano, world known soccer player had grown past six hundred pounds of fat in one month.

True, James had had to use chemicals and stimulants to push him further and further but, still…

And yet, the guy didn’t seem to notice. Well, also that wasn’t true. Cristiano had tried to fight back but, thanks to his ill placed faith in him and the constant onslaught of food, any thoughts of going back had simply disappeared. And thus, the New Cristiano had been created.

An always hungry eating machine, which passed more than twenty hours, each day, stuffing his mouth even though he wasn’t aware of it.

James decided to close his laptop and join the nurses into Cristiano’s room as he saw that the player was going to enter the simulation to start his exercise session for the day.

As Podrick entered the room he was greeted with the magnificent sight of Cristiano as he tried to place his titanic ass on the small-ish seat of the simulator. As the player realized that his coach was there, he tried to turn toward him, while still being hand-fed by his nurses, only to find himself stuck inside the simulator cabin.

“Hey, Cristiano, already up?”

“Yesh Coach *ulp*! I wanted…to practish…shome more…before going…to breakfast…”

“Well, that’s good but, don’t forget that you’re still on rest, so don’t push yourself too much. If you don’t feel up to it, just let it go for today.”

“You…really…think…so…Coach?”

“Sure, Cristiano. It never pays to over-exert yourself. You might end up hurting yourself even worse.
C’mon, let’s go back to bed. Take a break for today and tomorrow you will practice some more. Rest up and load up on energy.”

Cristiano burped quite loudly as his body continued to process and digest the massive amount of food it already contained, trying to make room for what more was coming. And yet he smiled at the thought of taking it easy with his practice sessions. He always felt tired and utterly spent of energies after his practice on the simulator, but he couldn’t realize that in truth it was his own body that was making him so tired.

With his atrophied muscles, and all that fat on his body, it was already a miracle he could still waddle, albeit slowly, but for James it wasn’t enough.

Cristiano had to become an immobile blob of a man before becoming his meal. And yet, the thought of seeing a barely mobile Cristiano, wearing his way too small soccer suit as he moved slowly on a soccer field, under the silent stare of thousands, made James shiver in anticipation.

But was that the correct course of action?

If Cristiano was still able to move, he still could be saved. While if he was to be fattened up to immobility, the chances of him recovering were very slim. But to lose the chance to utterly humiliate him and disgrace him in front of thousands of witnesses was very alluring.

What was a Cannibal Coach to do?
1241111112222.title: Super Obesus Sapiens

choices: Cristiano tries to move from his bed but can’t manage on his own
The bed literally breaks under Cristiano’s weight
He begin to feel so hungry he cannot stop eating
Cristiano wants to meet his Fianceé Georgina Rodriguez
12411111122224.content:
The following day, as Cristiano was waking up and beginning his daily activities, he saw his coach enter the room with a huge smile on his face.

“Yo…Coach…what’s…the good…news?”

James simply smiled even more as he quickly ordered the two nurses around to help Cristiano stand.

“Oh, Cristiano. I just got news from our sponsors that you’ve been selected to try a new kind of fitness therapy. Thanks to this therapy, so they say, your recovery should speed up way faster.”

Crsitiano smiled weakly at the news, only the mentioning of any kind of physical activity was unconsciously treated as a bad news from the overfed soccer player. Still, for his coach to be this excited it had to be something so, he simply nodded and, helped by his nurses, he slowly followed Podrick toward the bathroom in his room. Once there, he saw that the jacuzzi pool wasn’t actually filled with water, but with some yellowish liquid which, in truth, caused his own belly to rumble hungrily.

“What…is...that...?”

“That, Cristiano, is melted butter. Apparently, it should help relax and reinvigorate your body. As per the new therapy that you’ve got to follow, you’ll have to have at the very least two immersions each day. Don’t you worry, I’m sure you will love it.”

Cristiano didn’t seem as excited as James was but, with nothing to lose he moved his body toward the pool and slowly entered it, until only his head was breaking the surface. As a few minutes passed by, he began to feel nice in there.

The melted butter was kinda greasy but, its warmth was doing wonder to help relax the ex-soccer player. As he sat in the pool he didn’t seem to realize that he alone was almost occupying the entire pool and, before he could muster any thoughts, his nurses came to him carrying with them a funnel, some small kegs of beer and several trolley’s worth of food.

“Now Sir, as your Coach instructed, we will proceed with the new therapy plan.

As per instruction received, as you dip and relax, we will provide you with booze and food, the first will help you reach a deeper sense of calm, the second will be part of your new diet.”

Before Cristiano could say anything the two nurses had placed a tube into his mouth and, through the funnel, they began pouring liters of beer inside of the obese soccer player. He, from his side, couldn’t do much but sit back, relax and swallow, and so he did. After a while though, Cristiano felt the tube between his lips being taken away, as his two nurses moved closer, bringing him the food for his new diet.

As he rubbed his blubbery gut with slow circular movements, starting to enjoy the feeling of all that butter surrounding him, he saw that the first platter they brought to his lips was a huge triple decker burger, with lots of sauce and fried bacon. That burger was so greasy that already a small pool of it was starting to accumulate on the platter but, for Cristiano nothing mattered but to have that within himself in the shortest time possible.

For almost two hours the nurses continued to feed Cristiano with greasy food and beer, until they noticed that the level of melted butter in the pool had drastically reduced.

Smiling, the two helped Cristiano get out of the jacuzzi and, still dripping buttery goodness, they brough him toward a large massage bed nearby.

“Here, Sir. Please to lie down here so that we can provide you with a nice massage. Afterward, we will move to your bed so you can rest a bit before having your daily exercise regimen into the simulator.”

The player, absentmindedly licking his own fingers, simply did as he was asked and soon found himself in a new kind of paradise. As he lay on the bed, one of his two nurses massaged him slowly but forcefully, kneading every inch of his fattened body, while the other brought to him even more snacks and food for him to consume.

“Eat up, Sir, you need to load up all the energies you can muster.”

Cristiano felt in heaven.

Between his still sensitive skin being massaged and the delicious sweets that he was eating he honestly felt at his best. Still, for one moment, he began to wonder why he was eating so much but, it was nothing but a fleeting thought, soon swept away by the avalanche of delicious goods passing within his lips.

Almost an hour later, feeling full to bursting, Cristiano was slowly moved from the bathroom toward his room and, in the fifteen minutes he needed to change room, he began to feel himself grow hungry again.

Nevermind that he had eaten all morning, he just felt his stomach rumble hungrily, demanding sustenance. Food had become his staple and the absence of it something that his body feared.
