“Miss Gwen? You’re awake, good. I’ve got here your mid-afternoon snack. All part of the regimen you’re following.”

As the singer still laying on the deck chair stared at the maid, this one placed the tray right on Gwen’s thighs, just as the singer looked in shock at what had been brought to her.

‘Holy crap…’

Right in front of her lay the tray that Helen had brought to her, filled with a mix of various baked sweets.

In the tray, in fact, there seemed to be a couple of any baked sweet she has ever known, and even she hadn’t ever seen before. There were donuts, at least three pair of them, a couple of eclairs, some bear claws and then she saw a few small round sweets made of apparently sponge cake layered with ricotta cheese and candied fruit. Curious about these strange sweets she grabbed one and gave it a bite feeling its soft texture almost melting in her mouth, with a touch of liqueur burning a bit in her throat. AS she moaned in pleasure, Helen moved forward, offering her some suggestions.

“Miss Stefani, if I may…The one you’re tasting now is an Italian recipe called ‘Cassata’. It is said that although it may seem to be quite a feat to consume, it truly isn’t. I also suggest you to try these as they are…”

Pretty soon, with the suggestion coming from the maid, Gwen found herself practically shoveling those sweets in her mouth, enjoying the rich taste of them, as she lost herself in the deliciousness of the various pastries. Soon, too soon in her mind, she found her hand searching n the tray for more, only to find crumbs and some residual powdered sugar.

‘What? I’ve really cleaned the full tray?’

Yet, she couldn’t deny to herself that everything tasted delicious and that she didn’t feel as bloated and weighted down as she expected herself to feel. It was with a somewhat deluded expression that she gave the, now empty, tray back to the maid and she returned to lay down on the deck chair.

The singer looked sheepishly at her, once more, bloated middle but it was only for a few fleeting moments, right before sleep caught to her once more and she let herself go in a calm nap, as her body began digesting the new income of calories. This process kept going for several days, with Felipe using the singer shame to force her to stand down and willingly accept anything he prepared for her. And as days passed, each meal started to slowly become heavier than the previous.

Still, Gwen rebelled less and less to this treatment, her willpower reducing as the weight of her shame was returned to her again and again. Soon enough she stopped entirely to try and fight back, instead accepting each meal brought to her as she tried to please Felipe with her eagerness in following his rules.

Felipe smiled at this turn of events.

With Gwen willpower reduced to dust, he had now free hand to shape her as he wanted.

He could force on her the idea that she had to do even more to please him or, now that she was somewhat subjugated to him, he could try and persuade her to grow some like of emotions, some feelings for Frank.

In any case, he had to start using the herbal tea on her, as he needed her to grow faster in order to break her down once and for all.
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Breaking Stefani willpower

choices: Double the doses, make her blow out with fat!
Keep thing as they’re going. Felipe’s getting suspicious
Gwen start loving this kind of life, she really needs to thank Frank
Stefani wonder about her suspicious size
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
As Gwen Stefani kept following the schedule from her Coach, someone watched her inflating figure from the shadows.

Helen, the personal maid assigned to Miss Stefani, had always worked diligently, being mostly invisible to the eyes of any guest of her employer, as any maid should have done. But, since the change in management, with the departure of Miss Jolie and the installment of that strange man, Mr. Mbutu, Helen was finding difficult to remain focused on her job.

Helen had, in fact, always hidden deep below in her personality, a secret from the eyes of all around her.

Since her time in high school she had always been a secretive obesiphile. She had always enjoyed seeing other people grow fat or to help them get fat while never being under the spotlight. When she was working for Miss Jolie, it hadn’t been so bad. She had always managed to keep her desire only to a fantasy level.

Under Felipe guidance instead, with the parade of fatties that was starting to pass through the mansion she was finding harder and harder to resist. Especially since she had seen from the shadows how Miss Jolie had ballooned, along with Carmencita. Still, at the time she had managed to resist. Now, though, with the famous singer Gwen Stefani following the same treatment she knew she couldn’t stand it anymore. She had to have an active hand in the process started by Mr.Mbutu.

With this new goal set in her mind, as she brought the first breakfast to the singer room, under Felipe’s instruction, she added of her own decision a few selected items to the portions she had to bring. Entering the room, she saw that Miss Stefani had just woken up and was, now, sitting in her bed, curiously inspecting the small layer of pudge that had started to show on her middle.

“Good Morning, Gwen.”

“Ah! Helen, hi.”

“I’ve here your breakfast, as per Mr. Mbutu request.”

As she said that, she brought the tray toward the singer,pacing it on her quilt covered thighs, as Gwen looked in surprise to the ‘hearty’ meals awaiting her. Under her eyes, in fact, there were a four eggs omelette, four large sausages, a rather large mound of fried bacon strips, a few fried slices of tomatoes and two vanilla milkshakes. To this, Helen, had added also a couple muffins which she had baked the night before while adding into the batter some appetite stimulants.
As Gwen began eating the massive meal, still trying to follow up the instructions of Felipe, she decided to ask a few questions to the maid that was milling around in the room.

“Uhm…Helen? May I…*munch*…ask you a question?”

“Sure, Miss. If I can assist in any way…”

“Do you think I’ve put on weight?”

Helen, a bit embarrassed but, also, turned on, at first seemed to take time to answer, then she turned toward Gwen and, while smiling as sincerely as possible, she answered back.

“Mmh. If I can be sincere, I don’t see anything really. So, it may be that you’re feeling like you’ve gained weight due to the stress of living in a new environment.”

Stefani, as she cleared the eggs and the sausages, drinking them down with the first milkshake, cleaned her lis with a napkin, before turning her stare on the garden visible through the window in the room.

“Hum…Maybe you’re right.”

With that she took one of Helen’s muffin and began, distractedly to nibbling it. Helen, instead, began to observe as much as she could without being detected. In a few minutes she noticed that Stefani started to eat more fiercely at the muffin, cleaning it out in a few bites, turning then on the second one, unaware that her hunger was only going t grow stronger.

Stefani had eaten most of her meal, feeling content already but, as she nibbled on the muffin she began to feel her hunger returning. In few moments she found herself as if starving and, quickly, she began to devour also the second muffin and even whatever was still on her plate. With the tray cleaned out she let out a wistful sigh in seeing Helen carry it out, leaving her alone for the morning, with no more food available.

Gwen, knowing full well how Felipe wanted her to follow his treatment, didn’t raise any fuss, although she was still feeling a bit hungry.

Helen, as she carried the empty tray back to the kitchen was almost giggling in joy. The experiment had been a success, but, since she didn’t want to intrude too much on Felipe’s plans, she decided to keep on giving, once or twice per day, the stimulants to the singer, but without upping the portions dedicated to her too much. This way, it was going to be Stefani the one requesting to up the portion and she, Helen, could remain in the shadows.

As days passed, Felipe noticed that Gwen Stefani was managing to clean out anything he sent to her. As he had done with Angelina, he wanted to keep things slow at first but, the singer seemed to have other ideas in mind. As Felipe was cleaning the kitchen, preparing it for lunch time, he was suddenly interrupted by the presence of Gwen Stefani. Turning to look at her he saw immediately she was well on her way to acquiring some definite pudge on her middle but, what surprised him the most was the request she had come to ask to him.

“Felipe? Sorry, can I disturb you for a moment?”

“Sure, Gwen. Tell me, what can I do for you?”

“I…I don’t want to sound like I’m objecting to your treatment and your plans but…lately I’m finding the portions that I’m receiving…way too small. Would it be possible to increase them a little? I mean…”

Felipe was intrigued by the request. He already was preparing her meals with quantity enough for two people and, yet, Gwen seemed to be wanting even more of it. At first, he thought of a secondary effect of his Tea but, he hadn’t started to give it to her yet. The only thing he could think of was that Gwen had started to reveal her gluttonous side and so, how could he ask her to curb it?

“I…Ok. No worries, Miss Gwen. Will increase your portions a bit, maybe add a few more snacks throughout the day?”

At that Gwen nodded contently, just as her little belly rumbled in appreciation. Felipe, smiling, invited her to take a set nearby as he kept preparing lunch, while giving her a plate with a few brownies he had asked Helen to prepare the night before.

“Here Miss, I think you can have some of these, if you want.”

As He watched Gwen attacking the plates of sweet he wondered if, considering the increased appetite of the singer, it was still a good idea to start giving her also his herbal tea. But, after pondering a while on it, he decided that it was probably just a temporary thing for the singer to feel this hungry and so decided to not to worry about it too much.

“Miss Gwen, here, you might want to have some of this tea, it’s made with some herbs from my country which have a soothingly effect on your stomach.”

As the first month in the mansion passed, two weeks since Helen had started to provide Gwen with the stimulants, the maid was truly enjoying the situation she was in. Between the appetite stimulants she managed to give to Miss Stefani and whatever Felipe did, the singer seemed to be facing a period of almost constant, never ending hunger. Which resulted in her asking, day after day, to up her portions more and more. This naturally was having quite the effect on her body, which was putting on pounds faster and faster, although the singer didn’t really seem aware of it.

That morning, for example, as Helen entered Gwen’s room, she could see that the singer was still asleep in her bed, the remains of her latest night binge still surrounding her. The nightstand near the bed was still covered in plates which had contained a few small cakes and pastries just the night before. But were now empty.

Taking the dirty plates, she brought forward Gwen’s first pre-breakfast, carefully prepping the boat load of plates that Felipe had prepared for her first, of three, pre-breakfast meals. As weeks passed, Gwen found herself growing hungrier and hungrier, always wanting for more food to be given to her. Helen knew that partially it was because the singer was growing heavier, and so her natural hunger was growing too, but mainly it had to be the stimulants she was still giving to the singer.

As she finished preparing the massive meal, which was fit for at least four people, she took her time to check out Gwen’s body. She started from her face, noticing that still it looked quite thin, although her neck was starting to get thicker. Her torso, too, was swelling up quite nicely, her breasts had grown past the E cup, and had already started to lose some of their perkiness. Then there was her belly, it was a growing mound which seemed to be growing wider every passing day. Already it was hanging down on her crotch and yet, it seemed to be hanging lower and lower.

Helen could barely contain herself, seeing how big the singer was getting, and it was only her first month with them. She could only dream how big she could make her. She only had to decide if she wanted to continue as she was doing or maybe, if she had to increase the dosage…
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: The maid who loved parade floats…

choices: Felipe agrees, Frank comes to the mansion
Felipe refuses. Gwen has to be properly focused on Frank before the meeting
Helen Ignore the request and stuff Stefani even more
Blake Shelton contacts Gwen with apologies
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.content:
Gwen Stefani, after finishing her last lunch for the day, took her time to think on how her life was going in the Mansion, following Felipe’s treatment. Lately, all she seemed to be doing was to sit down in the dining room, on a comfortable couch, and eat at whatever Felipe prepared for her. At first, she had been worrying about her size, for she thought she was getting worriedly bigger.

After a check in with Felipe and after seeing her weight on a scale she understood that it was all in her head. True, she hadn’t believed it herself at first but, after seeing with her own eyes the numbers on the scale, she realized that it really had to be all in her head. So, she simply stopped worrying and, after some time, she even stopped checking her weight.

It was really too much of a hassle to rise and stand, walk up to the scale and then stand there…it was all too much of an issue, so she simply let herself go, trusting completely Felipe and his treatments.

As she sat there, massaging her overfilled belly, which pushed out in front of her of at least a couple of feet, she thought about her situation. Stifling a burp, barely, she realized that she truly was enjoying living there. It was just so carefree to pass her time doing basically nothing and she had realized that she also had to be growing healthier already, since her appetite was growing almost every other day.

And for this there was only a person she had to thank, really.

It was her manager, Frank.

As she thought about him, with Helen at her side pushing within her lips a large éclair, since it was time for her post-lunch snack, she felt something hot growing within her. Gwen already knew what it was. It had been only a month and something since she had been in the mansion but, even in such a short time she missed the company of her fiancée. But, alas, he didn’t seem to be reachable, even when she called him through text messages.

But the more food Helen pushed within her lips, the more she found herself thinking about Frank and not of her boyfriend. This realization jolted her awake. As she gulped down the last pastry that the maid had pushed within her lips, she grabbed her phone and started to type. Only to stop after a few minutes finding the activity way too tiring.

“Helen…Could you…please…write a …*urp*…text…for me?”

As the maid passed to her a massive tray still loaded full of donuts and other sweets, she took the phone and waited for Gwen’s input. The singer began cramming food into her mouth, not feeling truly hungry but more as she had gotten used to chew and swallow.

“Alright…type this…Dear Frank…wanted to… apologize…for contacting…you so…late. Its nice…in here…and am glad…you managed…to reserve…this spot…for me.

I will…see with…Felipe… if is possible…to meet you…one of these…days. Gotta…thank you…for all you’ve…done for me. Will…let you…know. xoxo Gwen”

As the singer kept dictating the text, she also kept her mouth stuffed with food, pushing donut after donut within her lips. As soon as Helen had written the text and sent it, the roles reversed one more. Gwen returned to laid back on the couch, massaging her increasingly more stuffed gut, as the maid began anew to feed more and more sweets into the fattened singer.

Helen, for one, was truly getting excited in seeing how the singer grew. As per last weigh-in, almost a week ago, Gwen had already surpassed the 250 pounds of beautiful fat. And since she had grown accepting the lifestyle, she didn’t problem herself anymore with how much food, both Helen and Felipe, pushed onto her.

Already she was on such a massive calorie laden feast that it was astonishing how bigger she was getting and, most importantly, how accepting of it all she was. Helen couldn’t wait to see how long it would take for Gwen to outgrow the couch she was currently sitting on.

Felipe was amazed at the change in Gwen’s demeanor in respect to her start. Since he managed to break her will, the singer had grown on a, almost, daily basis both in her appetite and in her mass. At first he had worried that she could realize how big she was getting but, thanks to appropriate countermeasures, the scale set to show a specific weight, and the help from Miss Gwen dedicated maid, Helen, the singer/actress had swelled up beautifully and out of any of his plans.

To say the truth he suspected that Helen had done something to her. Since her increased appetite didn’t seemed to stop, but only increased as time passed. Still, he couldn’t say it was a bad thing. As he checked the clock, noticing that she had to be almost finished with her first post-lunch snack, Felipe turned on the stove again as he had to prepare the second post lunch meal for Stefani.

This time, he thought with glee, he decided to outdo himself and prepare for her a massive meal. After all, she needed to be at her fullest if he wanted to impress into her the idea that she loved Frank.

Gwen Stefani, meanwhile, had just finished her snack and was currently resting on her couch, with her huge globular belly pushing harder and harder on the extra sized shorts she was wearing. As she breathed, to recover energies, she saw Helen approaching her with another tray of goodies. Instinctually she licked her lips, already tasting the sweets that her maid was bringing to her.

“Hey…Helen…back again…uh?”

“Hey Miss Gwen. Just thought you could be still, somewhat, hungry. Didn’t want to see you starving. Don’t tell Felipe, though…”

Gwen smiled as she opened her mouth, accepting the first large slice of cake that Helen gave to her.

This had been going on for a while now, from the time when Felipe’s portions seemed to be less filling than usual. Helen brought her once a few pastries to help sate her hunger and, soon, it became the norm. Between the scheduled mealtimes and the additional snacks brought from the maid, Gwen soon got addicted to eat constantly, feeling strangely depressed if she wasn’t having something to eat all the time.

Still, the singer ate and ate some more. Everything was so good, so tasty. And she wasn’t gaining a single pound from it. As the first cake was quickly polished, the maid brough out of the tray a second one, starting aew to feed slice after slice into the fattening whale of a woman sitting on the couch.

As the feeding proceeded, the camisole that Gwen was wearing suddenly ripped in half, the buttons flying everywhere as her belly surged out even bigger than before.

“Woah! You guys…sure know your…way in a…kitchen but…laundry…isn’t your…strength…uh?”

“Sorry about that, Miss Gwen. Here, have some more cake, it will help ease your mind.”

As Stefani kept indulging, unaware of how her body was changing, her phone thrilled signaling that a new message had arrived. As Helen kept feeding her, Gwen rapidly scrolled through the messages and saw that Frank had answered back, thanking her and that he would have loved to meet with her. Startling, for she hadn’t expected that, Gwen felt her heart flutter a bit.

Maybe it was due to Blaken absence, maybe since she had grown wiser living in the mansion, but she felt truly happy knowing that Frank wanted to meet with her.

“He…Helen…Can you…ask Felipe…If it would…be ok…for me…to meet…Frank…here…one of… these days?”
1242223333323323223322211122121131321323.title: Loving the life & thanking Frank

12422233333233232233223131.title: brad pitt and angelina jolie

124222333332332322332231313.content:
The married couple Pitt/Jolie had been married for a long time now, but as of late the two were having almost constant fights with each other, often followed by a temporary reconciliation. Still the two of them did love each other and wanted to find a more permanent solution.

While checking on the internet they suddenly saw an AD for a counsellor, which seemed to have a huge amount of fans and followers.

After a quick search and confirmation of the info on the guy, they took an appointment and went with it.

A week later, the two of them entered his studio and seated on the couch as they waited for the guy to start their session. The Doctor’s name tag Recited ‘Dr. Sweet’ and he seemed quite the average Joe. The only thing that stood out on him was a strange glint in his eyes, a glint that some people seemed to find unnerving.

Apart for that, all reviews about him were extremely positive.

As he entered and sat on a small couch right opposite to the married couple he smled as he greeted them.

“Good Morning Mister Pitt, Miss Jolie. I’m Philodendron Sweet, but you may simply call me Phil. Now, I would like to keep this as informal as possible, if that is okay with you.”

The couple silently nodded with each other, at which the doctor smiled back.

“That’s good. Already from this I can see you’ve been a loving couple from many years. But it does seem you’re having some issues lately. Don’t worry though. We’ll find a solution, together.”

As they started to delve deeper and deeper into the issues that the couple was facing, the doctor began to formulate a plan on how to solve the situation with his new clients and to solve a minor matter that had been persecuting him lately.

You see, Philodendron had always been a different child. He had grown in a family that considered the rest of mankind as nothing more than an additional source of food. Growing up he was taught that to enjoy the taste of the human flesh was a good thing, something that most should have given out freely. But apparently he hadn’t ever found anybody who wanted to share their personal bounty and so he had to reinvent himself to satisfy this need he had.

It was for this that he decided one day to study the behavior of the human mind and, after mastering various degrees, he opened up his studio.

Helping people pair up…and then chewing’em down.

The two celebrities in front of him were going to be the icing on his figurative cake. He had just to let them grow together, both in happiness and in size, and then he could finally see if fame made the flesh taste better…just like a normal steak and one prepared by a gourmand were two different worlds apart.

After a bit of discussion, being able to discern that the two of them were simply having a normal issue with their own respective careers, he decided the best course of action for them.

“Brad, Angelina. I’ll be sincere. The two of you look perfect together but you’re letting your own greed getting in the way of your relationship.

I personally say that there is an easy solution to try to solve this and prevent any further fights between you.

You should try to take a breath of rest from your own careers, for a while at least, and following a specific schedule that I will prepare based on the information you’ve given me, you shall try to rest, relax and enjoy life together.

To have a better effect, I would suggest following you on a more personal level. By living with you and helping you on this journey. You will see that in no time you two will return to the best time of your relationship.

Would it be acceptable for you?

Otherwise we could find some other solutions. I could follow you one by one, but it would require a longer period. Or maybe, I can give you two some different objectives, thus forcing you to decide which you prefer best, if the objective or your true love.”
124222333332332322332231313.title: Marriage troubles

choices: A typical day of the couple

Brad wish for a bigger Angelina
1242223333323323223322313131.content:
Brad and Angelina looked at each other for a moment, whispering between them for a few minutes but, in the end, they decided to try it and so gave their confirmation.

The following week we find the married couple sitting at their kitchen table, reading out from a report that Dr. Sweet had prepared for them, giving directions and pointers to what their weekly schedule were going to be, both Brad and Angelina read on with a quizzical look on their face, as they began discussing the schedule with the good doctor, who sat near them sipping a small cup of coffee.

“So, Phil…?”

“Yes. Brad?”

“Err…I get the whole ‘no work for a month’ thing but also no exercises? No workouts? Nothing at all?”

“You see, Brad, we are trying to bring peace and quiet within the two of you. Exercises bring the idea of competition and, through that, anger toward the less performing of the two of you. We do not need that. So, no work, no exercises, no workouts.

Just rest and restful activities that you can do as a couple.

Yes, Angelina?”

“Yeah…I was wondering…er, is this meal plan accurate? I mean, six meals per day doesn’t sound…too much?”

“That is a common misconception. It doesn’t matter what you eat but how often you eat. See, to reach an easier peace of the mind, you’ve got to be able to concentrate on what’s really important. By eating often, you give your body a constant intake of energies that will grant you additional resources to reach the bliss. Otherwise your body would have to spend precious energies to always be on the lookout to satisfy its hunger.”

For almost half an hour the married celebrities kept on discussing with the doctor but, in the end, they had to accept all his proposals. They were a bit worried about this turn in their lifestyle but, in the end, as they started following the schedule they both began to grow more and more complacent as time passed.

During that week the two of them didn’t do much more that wake up late, watch television together, sleep together and, of course, eat.

As they followed Dr. Phil’s diet of six meals a day, with a constant stream of snacks out of the mealtimes, it was no wonder that both their bodies began requesting more than what they were currently having. Still, in that week, both Brad and Angie, noticed that there were no fights, no arguments but a simple calm and acceptance of what was going on around them.

Phil followed the two celebrities all week, watching them from afar, pushing them from time to time in the correct direction…toward gluttony. And the results were promising so far.

Neither of the two had gained that much in that simple week but, it was normal. Phil knew that the week he had instructed them to follow was necessary to instigate their bodies to start slowing down their metabolism and to get them used to eating more. And that they had done.

As the new week began Phil made sure to be always reachable and, while doing so, to always have time to provide a few more detailed suggestion or instruction to his client. That morning, for example, as he was brewing some coffee in the kitchen he saw Brad coming down from their master bedroom and sit at the table beside him, while ordering around their servant to prepare him a hearty breakfast.

“Consuelo? Please, could you make me a few eggs with fried bacon? Four or five eggs should be enough… Oh, Hi Phil. How’s going?”

“Good Morning Brad. Well, shouldn’t be I to make that question to you? It’s fine, although, I wish I could see some better results from the two of you.”

As Brad began eating from the big plate he had received, he looked quizzically toward the doctor seated beside him.

“You see, Brad…Usually in the first week the couples grow closer through a common objective. You two instead are still on the ‘Finding your own peace’ moment. However, that’s okay, we will try to make your next week’s more relaxing.

Moreover, since we’re talking of this…I’ve been thinking of increasing your daily regime a little bit. As a couple you guys are way too singlehandedly active. That isn’t good. For this reason I’m going to implement some required nap time that the two of you will have to follow together.”

“But, Phil, how could we do that? If I haven’t need for any sleep how would I…?”

“Easy. Let Dr. Sweet work on it. You’ll soon see.”

That morning, as Brad and Agelina sat on the couch together, watching some tv shows, trying to follow the schedule from their doctor, their servants brought them their snacks for the mid-morning, but both watched stunned as their usual small bowls of snack was replaced with a large Devil Food’s cake for Brad and a large apple pie for Angelina.

As the two looked at the massive treat, Philodendron appeared behind them with a smile.

“Now, guys, you need to relax. To do so, you will eat some snacks until the both of you feel sleepy. This way, you will snuggles beside each other and move forward toward the peace and calm you so desire.

I already instructed your servants about this, so don’t worry about a thing. Just eat, sleep and relax.

Everything will be taken care of.”

‘Oh yes. Soon the two of you will get used to gorge all the time…I can’t wait to see it happens…’
1242223333323323223322313131.title: Philodendron in the house!

choices: Moving cost calories, let them stay in bed all day
12422233333233232233223131311.content:
It was near the end of the second week since Brad and Angelina had started to follow the advice from Dr. Sweet, and the two of them had never been as happy before.

As the clock ringed both woke up with a yawn, Brad was the first to rise to a sitting position, while scratching the beginning of a potbelly he was developing, while Angelina kept low on the bed but wide awake. Not a minute had passed since the clock ringing that their room door opened letting in two of their servants. These brought with them two tray, one for each actor, with their first pre-breakfast.

As both celebrities sat in their bed, they quickly accepted their trays and happily started digging in.

Brad began taking bite after bite at his large portion of fried eggs and bacon, washing it all down with the thick vanilla milkshake, his portion had been steadily growing since the previous week, reaching now a size that could have fed two normal people. Yet, Brad felt he could trust the good doctor advice and so didn’t see anything wrong in its size.
Angelina instead licked her lips as she surveyed her own pre-breakfast, it had been constantly changing in the last week but, apparently it had finally settled on a constant barrage of sweets. In front of her, in fact, there was a large bowl filled with chocolate brownies, a couple of large muffins and a big plate with a particularly large slice of devil’s food cake, with a side of three dollops of ice cream.

Both celebrities did a quick work of both trays and, as soon as they were cleaned, the two maid quickly took the tray’s away, leaving the two celebrities to rise from the bed, to prepare themselves for the continuation of the day. With a belly full of sweets, Angelina was the first one to rise and, as she did every morning, she began her day by taking a quick shower and then wear her usual attire for the day. A pair of short shorts in spandex, with matching sports bra. As it had become usual, she quickly inspected herself, noticing that she had become a bit softer than before but, with her new relaxed attitude she simply dismissed the thought and went on with her day.

Brad was in a similar position, after dressing up in a pair of sweater pants and shirt, he gave himself a good look in the mirror. He flexed a bit his slightly flabbier body and, as per instruction received he knew that by being bigger he was going to be stronger. As he finished, he too, left the room and followed his wife down toward the kitchen where their true breakfast was awaiting them, along with the good doctor.

As the two of them were seated at the kitchen table Doctor Phil smiled and greeted them, while sipping a bit of coffee, as they began to consume the first proper meal of the day. Brad, seated at one end of the table, happily munched on a dozen hot dogs, as he kept staring at both his wife and to his next plate, chocked full of fried bacon and sausages.

Beside him, always within reach, there were a couple of tall glasses full with an energy drink, spiked with some spoonful of bulk up powder.

Opposite to him sat Angelina, she too was rapidly consuming quite a large breakfast while feeling decidedly content in refilling her belly with the food she was starting to get addicted to. In front of her there were several plates, the nearest ones were full of fluffy pancakes drowned in syrup and butter, then there were a few more with chocolate covered waffles and finally a large platter with half of a massive chocolate cake covered in frosting.

Angelina smiled toward Phil as she began to dug in the delicious food. She had shown some resistance at the beginning but, as the doctor pointed out, she had to live more relaxed to return to her old love life.

Plus, she was beginning to enjoy following that diet.

As they both cleaned out their respective plates, both actors lay on their chairs panting slightly. As it was becoming a normal occurrence, both felt tired after eating their breakfast and always needed some minutes to just recover from it. Their bodies though began rapidly to digest and process all the food they had consumed, something that Phil loved to be able to see right in front of his eyes.
Still, after a few minutes rest, the two quite bloated celebrities slowly waddled toward the couch where they would spend most of their day. Sitting there, side by side, they began to watch some shows on the TV, as their maids began bringing them some snack every few minutes. Distracted by the shows Brad kept chowing down on all snacks that he received from the maids, chewing noisily on hot dogs and burgers and sloppily drinking soda after soda. Angelina, seated right beside him, wasn’t in a better position.

She too was so focused on the TV that she barely registered on how much she was eating, filling her mouth with more and more chocolaty snacks and treats. The maids, from their side, weren’t aware of what was going on but, as they had been ordered to follow the Doctor’s indication they simply did as he said.

And so for most of the morning the married couple kept on guzzling down food and drinks as they kept watching the television until, usually, Brad began to feel sleepy. It was at that moment that Phil, always checking on the two, proceeded to increase the quantities delivered to Angelina which, with more food on her hands, simply began to consume it faster and faster until she simply crumbled, falling asleep right beside her husband.

Leaving the two stuffed love birds napping for almost an hour, Phil began to organize for their next main meal of the day. Lunch.

As soon as the hour had passed, the maid went and began to wake up the two bloated celebrities, urging them to rise from the couch and, almost, pushing them to the dining room were their first lunch awaited.

Both Brad and Angelina, even though were still feeling somewhat full, couldn’t deny that they were growing addicted to the constant gorging and so, without too much of a fight, both began to eat once more. If they hadn’t been so focused on stuffing themselves to the fullest both could have noticed that their dietary regimen, apart from the sheer quantities, were very strange. Brad seemed to be following an all carbs and protein diet, with all of his meals consisting mostly in meats and baked breads. While Angelina was more on a carbs and sugar diet, being given for the most parts sweets and sugary treat and beverages.

Both celebrities tough, didn’t seem to mind how much they were eating, especially since they were so focused on eating that they didn’t seem to realize how much of it they were pushing down in their gullets.

It was at that moment, as the two were enthralled by their full six course meals that Doctor Phil began, as he did every day, to lay an additional insurance to have the two actors steadily growing bigger and fatter.

“Brad…” Phil began, whispering softly in the man ear, as he was still focused on eating away at the large one pounder burger in front of him.

“Brad…Keep going Brad. Keep eating.
Remember…the more you eat, the more you grow…the bigger you are, the stronger you’ll become.

And look at her, Brad…isn’t she beautiful? How could a skinny little thing like you stay with her…unless you grow bigger and stronger…

Be strong, Brad…be the biggest for her…”

The words, the tone, everything in Phil voice was calculated to impact on Brad subconsciousness, to force him to see the world as Philodendron wanted him to see it. Brad, focused as he was, couldn’t do much but listen to that voice and turn his world around it. Convincing himself that what the voice said was true.

After working his magic on Brad, Phil moved on Angelina.

“Angie…you’re such a good girl. Aren’t you, Angie?

But good girls will eat what they have on their plate. Eat Angie, eat and enjoy.
Remember, food is good. Exercise is bad.
Look at Brad, he’s awesome, isn’t he? But he’s like that because he eats his food.

Eat up, Angie. Remember, eating makes you grow more beautiful…the more you eat the more amazing you become…”

As soon as lunch finished, Brad and Angelina collapsed right where they were. Huffing and puffing, both celebrities felt good, due to Phil’s hypnotical suggestions, but as it was becoming a common occurrence, they both couldn’t move an inch. Brad leaned back on his chair, slowly and carefully caressing his overburdened belly. Forced to open up the zip of his sweater shirt he laid there breathing slowly as the literal weight of all the food consumed kept him from moving. Angelina, seated opposite from him, didn’t fare much better. Sure, she was wearing clothes more comfortable, without feeling them grow tight on her belly, but with the compulsion instilled in her by Phil, even though she was feeling full she kept on eating, trying with all of her resolve to lick clean her plates. Eventually though, she stopped and collapsed in a similar pose to her husband.

Slowly and carefully, as they were still full and overstuffed, they rose from their chairs and, helped along by their maids, they moved to their master bedroom, where they passed some time together. At first, they spent that time cuddling together…but as the days passed and their forms began to grow bigger and fuller, the two of them began to spend that time by sleeping and digesting together.

And yet, as this was the end of the second week, Philodendron wanted more from them... But what could he do with them?

Possibilities were endless…
12422233333233232233223131311.title: It's your typical morning...

choices: As they grow bigger, something changes within them
Phil decide to weigh them and measure them
As the couple grows, so do some of the maids
Some friends of Brad come to visit them
124222333332332322332231313111.content:
As weeks passed Phil decided to keep things quiet and let the couple to slowly fill out. And it was working.

Both Brad and Angelina kept following the dietary advices from Dr. Phil and, without any worries they steadily kept growing as their meals and snacks grew larger as well. It was barely one month passed since Phil entered in their lives and both were already showing some distinctive changes in their figures.

Brad noticed how larger his paunch was getting, along with his arms and legs, and yet thanks to the hypnotical guidance from Phil he knew that he was building mass that would have grown into muscles, eventually. Still, he couldn’t refrain, in the privacy of his bathroom, to play a bit with his paunch. Lifting it up and watching it as it jiggled when he let it go.

In the main room, Angelina was also watching herself at the mirror.
She was admiring her forms as they grew, in her conditioned eyes, more and more voluptuous, more feminine. She quickly passed her hands from her breasts, feeling as they had grew heavier and bigger, to her potbelly. She knew that once she had abs there, but she also could see how more beautiful she was now, it was way better the way she was growing. Naturally, she couldn’t see how the rest of her body had been growing. Her butt was growing exponentially, along with her thighs, and it was a common occurrence for her to knock things down when she was walking. Her face also had grown rounder, starting to grow more cherubic, her chin softening up as a second chin began to slightly appear under the first.

Yet, as their bedroom door opened, both turned there their attention, eagerly awaiting their next meal. At the doorway one of their maids peeked through the door informing them that their first breakfast was ready. At this news, both Brad and Angelina quickly put on some clothes and walked slowly toward the kitchen, where they were greeted by a table choked full of delicacies.

Brad smiled as he saw that in front of him there was a large plate chocked full of fried eggs with a small mountain of fried pork bacon as a side dish. Using his fork Brad didn’t waste anytime in take large mouthful of the eggs, and having some bacon strips every now and then, completely oblivious to the small rivulets of grease that were flowing down on his chin. Opposite to him Angelina was also going strong, as she had begun cleaning out a plate full of powdered donuts, while also having spoonsful of ice cream from the gallon tub that her maid had left near her. A couple of hours later, as both had cleared out several plates of food, both actors leaned back on their chairs, burping and belching as they tried to make some more room.
Right on time, Phil sat at the table with them.

“So Brad, Angelina, how do you feel?”

“*Burp!* G-Good…but full…”

“As Brad said…*belch*…It’s so good…though…”

“Well, I’m happy to hear that. Maybe you didn’t notice it…but in the last month you didn’t argue not even one time.”

Hearing that the married couple perked up, as they both caressed their own growing form with fondness.

‘And you don’t even realize that by eating all the time you couldn’t argue even if you wanted…’ Though Phil with a smile before continuing.

“Still, there is no time to rest. We still have a lot of work to do. For starters we must make sure that both of you are as relaxed as you can be. Then we can focus on some exercises to have the two of you enjoying some activities together.
And, final, if everything goes as it should, you will be able to enjoy a trip together that you will remember till your last days…”

‘A special trip indeed…right into my belly.’

As the day progressed, the two actors began to be fed almost every time they could, and from that point onward they kept on being overstuffed constantly. Whenever they were, be the couch or the bathroom, one of their maids was constantly at their side pushing more and more food into their mouths. In less than two weeks Brad began to slightly outgrow his clothes, as he could see his belly began to peek out from under the sweatshirt he was using. Especially if he was laying down, he could see how dome shaped it was beginning to appear. Yet, he knew in his mind that it was a good thing, that it was meaning he was going to grow big and muscular. Alas, he didn’t notice that, along with his gut, his entire figure was rounding out, although most of the weight was centering on his stomach.

Angelina instead had been noticing that her clothes seemed to be shrinking, and yet she choose to fault their washer or the people using it, instead of realizing it was due to her consumption rate that she was ballooning up. And she was growing faster and rounder than her husband due to a constant onslaught of sweets and candies, cakes and pies. With a maid constantly at her side feeding her full time she truly seemed to be exploding out of her clothes. Still, both actors had their limits but Phil, and the maids as per orders received, didn’t stop at that.


“Caroline…I’m…I’m Full! Can’t…keep…going…”

Brad was laying on the couch, unable to move due to how full his belly was. His gut was filled out, a huge round balloon that forced him to lay there with his legs spreaded out. Yet, the maid at his side, Caroline, moved closer to him, with one hand massaging the taut stomach, while moving a hot dog toward his, still closed, mouth.

“But Sir, you know the schedule by now, thirty hot dogs by three PM…we’re going to be late if you don’t open up.”

Brad moved slowly his head reaffirming his idea.

“Too full…Let me nap…a bit…first…at least…”

“Alright Sir.” The maid conceded with a smile, as she simply began to massage the taut rounded gut with her free hand as she used the other to place a straw in between the actor lips. Brad, as he fell asleep, kept slowly sucking from the straw, unknowingly going to consume an entire five liters pitcher of weight gain shake.

Meanwhile, by the pool, Angelina was in a similar situation.
She was laying on a pool chair, her rounded out body engulfing the chair itself under its mass, her ass cheeks barely contained by it. At her side, with a trolley chocked full of sweets, there was her personal maid Sarah, personally assigned to her by Dr. Phil.

“C’mon Miss, one more slice and we can call it finished with this cake.”

“*Urp!* Urgh…too much…can’t have anymore…”

“Nonsense…I can feel plenty of room in here…”

As she said this, she grabbed more firmly the slice of cake in her hand and began to forcefully push it between Angelina’s lips. The actress grunted in pain but in the end couldn’t do much but open her mouth and accept the treat, chewing on it slowly until she painfully swallowed it.

“Please…no…more…” She whimpered, but the maid seemed to be deaf to her words.

“Oh, please, Miss. Don’t be such a child…here come some more…”

Quickly, Sarah, grabbed another slice of cake from her trolley, this time devil’s food, and pushed it once more against Angelina’s mouth, who couldn’t do nothing else but accepting it once more. This process repeated itself several times, each time the actress stomach grew larger and wider as more food was packed inside it. After some time, Angelina began to stop feeling pain and began to feel some kind of pleasure from being so much under pressure.

A couple of pies later, Sarah felt the tautness in Angelina’s gut and motioned to stop but, felt the hand of the actress on her wrist.

“Miss?”

“*Belch!*…Mf…M-More…*Urp!*Give…me…more…”

The maid looked at the beached whale in front of her. She didn’t know why both she and her husband had decided to follow such a fattening diet, but it wasn’t her place to discuss it. Returning to the present, she looked down at her mistress and, seeing that she truly wanted more she simply grabbed another piece from a sheet cake and brought it to her lips.

“Here you go, Miss…”

Angelina happily accepted the treat, moaning in pleasure from both the pain and the taste.

Philodendron was watching the scene from the camera feed. This was an unexpected result, and yet he wasn’t going to refuse it. He didn’t expect it from Angelina to grow attached to the feeling of being overfull, but he for sure was going to take advantage of it.

In the following weeks the gain for both the actors kept increasing steadily, as they slowly got used to the new portions and, as such, they had to be stuffed even more to reach the objective of stretching their stomaches. Angelina especially was growing at an astounding rate, quickly surpassing 250 pounds in less than three months, while Brad was still getting used to be slightly less than that. This increase though had quite the impact on both, as all their daily activities began to be harder to do, even the simplest one.

Brad was having trouble dressing himself up, as he could hardly lift his arms over his head and had to request assistance to do that. His wife instead, had way more trouble moving around as she was now constantly waddling around, her fattened body burdening her at her every step. She had to admit she kind of enjoyed how her entire body jiggled at her every movement, her burgeoning breast flesh sacks quivering like jelly, her gut slapping against her thighs. All of this she saw it as a sign that she was still growing more beautiful and so she redoubled her effort to grow even more.

Although she was finding hard to reach the point of being overfull, but she tried at her best all the same.
124222333332332322332231313111.title: Slow burn

choices: Focus on the relation Brad X Christie
Focus on Angelina as she tries to grow more for Brad
Phil makes a move on Angelina
1242223333323323223322313131111.content:
It is now almost five months since Brad and Angelina decided to follow the treatment suggested by their new marriage counselor, both of them have greatly changed in this time frame. Brad had reached the 300 pounds milestone, having to finally waddle around as his belly have grown so big that it started to overtake his crotch. His choice of clothes for the everyday also changed. Not being able to wear sweat, no matter how big, he’s turned to wear a muumuu’s that let his belly hang free and, without feeling constricted, he’s been able to increase his consumption even more.

Angelina instead, was growing at breakneck speed.

She had crested the 330 pounds and was now hurrying toward the 350. Wearing almost constantly bikini’s she felt wonderfully, even though she had noticed how harder it was to move around the mansion. She had truly ballooned under Phil’s guidance, as her body began to round out more and more. Her breast kept on growing larger, although they weren’t perky anymore, being pushed up only by the bikini top she was wearing. Her belly had grown massively, dividing itself in two large rolls when seated.
Her ass also didn’t stop growing wider, forcing her to move sideways when passing through doorways and, as of late, even through the hallways. The maids kept being around them 24/7, assisting them and feeding them all the time. Yet, Phil knew that something had to give, and he had to move first to avoid all this to end.

“Brad, Angelina? I’m seeing good progress here but, I still don’t see a good connection between you. For this reason, I want the two of you to spend more time together. From now on, the two of you will be staying in the same room all the time.
Due to some issues, I’ve had to upgrade your bedroom but I’m sure the two of you will love it.”

Both actors had been so focused in their food lust that they had barely registered the renovation on going in their own house, but as they were helped to their master bedroom, they could see that it had been completely renovated. Gone was the king-sized bed, replaced by two large mobile beds, each big enough to hold up to their growing sizes for months to come. These beds were the apex of modern technology, having included some screens to comfortably watch TV, an electric motor to lift a portion of the bed, letting the user to actually sit without even moving and, most importantly, including a chute system that would take care of any ‘trash’ in a complete silent and odorless way.

As the two once actors were placed on these beds, both enjoyed the feeling of comfort and their gains quickly increased as they now had no need to move at all. Between the maids feeding them and the possibility to simply ‘go’ whenever they needed, they simply stopped moving at all, constantly watching how their forms grew bigger and bigger. It was at this point that Brad, after months, began to closely watch at Angelina in a different way.

Afterall, even with his conditioned mind, he soon realized that his wife had grown massive.

At first, something inside of him seemed to be telling him that he had to love it but, after a while, as he kept staring at her gorging and growing form, he felt himself grow tired of her.

‘Look at her…How have I not noticed it before?
She’s growing to be such a pig. She’s so grossly huge!
I wonder if she could stand on her own…But I don’t think she can…’

Brad, being constantly beside Angelina had finally noticed how big she was getting but, he failed to notice that he was in the same situation. Still, As Phil noticed this situation to rise, he decided to take action to keep the two growing as big as they could. Quickly he checked within his records and found, within the maids, the girl he was looking for.

The following day, as the two actors had just finished their third breakfast, one of the maids moved closer to Brad as the actor was looking disgusted at Angelina starting on her fourth breakfast. The maid, Christie, placed her hand on Brad’s thigh beginning to caress it gently.

The actor, even though was eating again, turned toward the girl with an intrigued stare, just as she moved closer and began whispering in his ear.

“Such a shame that a wonderful man such as you have to be with a slob like her…”

“R-Really*urp*?...I-I…I mean…you’re..right…I…deserve….*gulp*…so…much…better…”

“I could give it to you, Sir…You’re so handsome…”

As Christie kept whispering, so her hand began to massage more seductively his lower belly, just above his nether regions. Brad began to eat faster, as he felt more aroused than he had felt in a long time.

“Such a handsome man…If only you could eat more…You could be the hottest hunk…”

As Christie began whispering more and more encouragements, so Brad kept on trying to eat faster and faster, falling line hook and sinker to the sweet words of the young and attractive maid, trying all he could to get to grow bigger for her. All thoughts of his wife beside him washed away by a desire for a younger woman.

As Brad began to focus on the maid, Angelina seemed to remain in the dark about her husband desire. She simply ate more and more, trying harder to become what she thought was the epitome of beauty.

choices: Angelina's the main meal…Brad will be dessert
Let them grow and see what happens
Angie’s not growing fast enough…let’s push her a bit!
Brad want the maid he's loving to grow as he’s doing…
12422233333233232233223131311112.content:
Angelina, following the advices of Dr. Phil had been focusing solely on growing more beautiful and voluptuous for her husband Brad. As she did so she realized how good it felt to feel painfully overstuffed, and yet the main reason for her to grow this voluptuous was still solely for her husband sake.

Yet, as of lately, she seemed to notice that Brad appeared as if he was getting away from her, as if he wasn’t interested anymore in her. Since they had a communication problem, as Dr. Phil said, she never faced him about the issue, but simply poured her thoughts to the good doctor that was following them.

Dr. Phil didn’t seem worried at all, and only with that, Angelina felt herself less worried. If the doctor wasn’t worried, things weren’t as bad as she thought, didn’t they?

Yet, the good doctor instructed Angelina on how to proceed to get back the attention from her husband, in the specific he told her that she had to grow more beautiful for him, she had to renounce to her youthful figure only to assume a curvier one to entice Brad into her.

“He’s a man, not a boy, Angelina. As a man he will be more receptive to a woman with real curves, and not to your current slim figure. You don’t have to be a stick thin model anymore Angie, if you want to get Brad to notice you, you’ll have to grow some curves…”

As Dr. Phil said that, Angelina was still on her bed, which had been moved from the room she shared with Brad, to a more private room where Philodendron could interact alone with the actress.

What Angelina couldn’t realize was that the figure to which Phil was referring to, she had already lost it weeks ago. In that exact moment, for example, as Angelina listened intently to her doctor advice, she was still being fed by her personal maid. And she really had the body to prove it.

Her body was now racing through pounds, shooting past the 350 and almost reaching the big 400 pounds. The bed on which she lay, it seemed to be getting smaller as days passed, as Angelina’s whole body grew larger and wider. Her ass had seemed to grow the most, no thong or panties could hope to keep it in, and as more calories were pushed inside her the more it kept growing. Similar situation was for the rest of her body, her billowy gut kept rising and was starting to obscure her most private areas. Her breast also grew larger and meatier, sure they lost their perkiness, but they increased in sheer size.

Her face also grew chunkier as time passed, another chin appeared under the first two, and overall her entire visage seemed rounder and rounder as time passed.

And yet, the actress couldn’t see the truth for herself.

In her eyes she was simply growing slightly curvier, and apparently not enough for her husband.

“Alright…doc…So…gotta…grow…more…womanly?”

“That’s right, Angie. For this reason, I’ll ask Sarah to double the portion of your meals and to triple the quantities of your snacks. You’ll see… a few weeks this way and you’ll be your husband dream come true.”

And so the actress barely had time to sleep, devoting instead all the time she could to eat more than she ever had, with the constant influx of food from both her own desire and the forcefulness of her maid, her growth began to show results right from the start. Angelina’s weight began to skyrocket, if before she was gaining a good five pound per day, under the new regimen she began to put on eight to twelve a day.
And yet she tried as best as she could to go over her limits.

Her figure literally ballooned.

In less than two weeks, her fattened body began to overtake the bed on which she was staying, as her fat thighs and ass-cheeks began to overflow it. And still she soldiered on, focusing solely on the food, she began to lose sight of her surroundings. It started to happen, again and again, that she focused so much on eating that she simply forgot of everything and everyone surrounding her. In her quest to reach the ideal figure for her husband, Angelina quickly transformed herself in an unstoppable eating machine.

Soon enough Philodendron noticed just how quickly the actress was ballooning, in short less than a month, although Brad had grown pretty massive too, reaching the 350 pounds thanks to the whispers coming from what he thought was going to be his lover, Angelina reached the 450 pounds, growing a vast hundred pounds heavier than her husband.

Philodendron couldn’t refrain himself, as he often began inspecting the growing couple, to touch more and more personally the growing form of the once lithe actress, caressing her every roll of fat, or simply by feeling her gut rising and falling as she breathed slowly.

‘Soon…Soon you’ll be ready Angelina. Sooner than expected you’ll be able to go on the last trip of your life.

I wanted to wait for the both of you to reach the quarter ton of weight but, as fast as you’re growing you may be a little too big to handle…or maybe I could wait and see when you’re going to plateau?’
12422233333233232233223131311112.title: Bigger and bigger…for love

Needed the couple testimonial to confirm his good work

124222333332332322332231313111124.content:
As time went on, Brad focused more and more his attentions on the lovely maid who came to stand beside him almost every waking moment. Due to her, he kept growing fatter and fatter at breakneck speed. He was still dwarfed by his wife but, as he kept eating to try to find satisfaction from Christie’s compliments, he really began outgrowing himself. And yet, as he kept staring lustfully to Christie, he had to notice how small she seemed compared to him.

As days passed, he noticed the vast difference in size between his wife Angelina (who was growing as big as a zeppelin in his eyes), himself (as he thought of himself as normal sized) and Christie, who seemed to be growing smaller and smaller. In those days, Brad began thinking about this matter. It was no easy task since, with the constant feeding and huge onslaught of food, he rarely had to think about anything except eating more but, powering it through, he realized what had to be the issue.

If he was normal sized, and his wife was way too big, it had to be that Christie was changing from fit to malnourished. Since he was beginning to love her presence around him, Brad decided that something had to be done. Naturally, he had to bring in the good doctor Phil but, he wanted to keep his affair secret (although he didn’t know it was all a scam prepared by the same Doctor).

For this reason, as soon as the Phil came into their room, Brad stopped eating and signaled the doctor he wanted to talk. Phil had already a hunch on what was going to happen, he had seen the results of the cameras feed and had been informed by Christie about the latest behavior of Brad. Still he requested a couple of maids to move Brad’s wheeled bed to a different room so they could have a chat in private.

As soon as they were alone, Phil sat nearby Brad, as he once more marveled at the sheer size the once actor had reached in those few months. The ex-actor had grown massive, although most of his weigh ended in the huge boulder belly he sported, the rest of him still had puffed up. As if a case study, Phil noticed how large Brad’s hand had become, the fingers do puffy he barely could move them or flex them anymore. The rest of him, with so little physical activity had grown more and more jelly like, making him appear similar to an overfilled waterbed.

“So, Brad, you wanted to tell me something? I know It can’t be a progress update, since I gave you both a full report just the other day…”

“N-no…It is…about…Christie.”

“Christie? Uh? Oh, the maid following you? What about her?”

“She’s…so…thin. Could be…she’s…not…eating…enough?”

“Umm…Now that you point it out, it may seem so. But I’m following the two of you, her lifestyle is not my business.”

“Wish…for…her…to…stay…healthy. She’s…loyal…employee…”

Phil could see the strain in Brad, the toll that doing something simple as talking was taking out of him. It was yet another milestone in Phil’s book regarding the growth of his two patients/future meals.

And still, Brad wasn’t wrong.

For when both he and his wife were gone, changed into massive food reserve for Philodendron, he would have to find something else to keep him be. Instead, if he could fatten up the servitude and, why not?, even some friends of the couple, he could stock on his favorite food for a long time.

“Well, Brad, this does you honor. To be worried as you are about your employees, shows how good natured you are. Angelina’s lucky to have you. Anyway, I’ll have a chat with her and try to convince her to follow a diet for a healthier lifestyle.”

“Thanks…Doc…appreciate…it.”

“Don’t mention it, Brad. After all is my job to keep the two of you happy and together.”

As soon as the other maids moved Brad back in the main bedroom, right alongside his wife, Phil called to him Christie, having her seat in front of him.

“So, Christie? How’s going with Brad?”

“I’m doing all I can to have him keep on eating as much as possible. As long you keep your part of the agreement, I will follow your instructions.”

As she said that Phil smiled wickedly. He had hired her to woo Brad only because he had found a leverage to keep her lashed to him. And that leverage was none other than Christie’s own family. The poor girl knew that her family, specifically her mother, was having financial issues and so Phil had volunteered to keep her secure at the cost of her help. It wasn’t the nicest of things to do to trick your own employer but, she didn’t have any other choice.

“I know you’re doing all you can, Christie, but there is something you could actually do to speed up things.”

“What is it? What more could I do?”

“Simple. From tomorrow, you shall be placed on a similar bed and keep him company from there. As if you were following their same diet.”

“What!? Are you crazy? I won’t be fattened up like them!”

Phil smiled sinisterly as he looked at the young girl.

“First, I won’t have you fatten up. Second, you don’t really have a choice, do you? Or you’re ready to maintain your mother as well as your brother?”

‘Especially…’ The doctor thought with a wicked grin ‘Since I had her moved on a twelve thousands calories per day diet, since she was moved in my facility.’

“N-No…I guess not. B-But you’re not going to make me grow as them, are you?”

“I’ve told you already, Christina. We’re only going to pretend.
You’ll be fed a tasteless sludge which doesn’t contain that many calories. So you’ll just stay there beside Brad, faking yourself to be following an healthier diet and he will return to his usual addiction.
Trust me.”

The following day, Brad noticed with glee that a new bed was placed beside his own, and on this one was laying his latest crush, Christie. As he saw her lay there, drinking away from a hose placed on her mouth he could easily deduce that the good Doctor had managed to convince her to follow the healthy diet he was following.

Smiling for his success, Brad, began eating faster and faster at whatever his maids were feeding him. Soon, Christie would become perfect sized again and he could finally make love to her without any fear of hurting her.

At the same time, as soon as the sludge entered Christie’s mouth, she realized something for the briefest moment.

For a single fraction of an instant, she realized that whatever was being forced in her mouth through the hose, was tasting divine. And that was worrisome, for the Doctor had said that it should have been tasteless instead. But, as more and more of that sludge was pushed between her lips, Christie soon lost interest in anything else, focusing only on the delicious stuff she was slurping up.

Philodendron looked pleased as he surveyed the master bedroom.

First there was Angelina Jolie, pushing near the 600 pounds, growing so largely pear shaped that her lower half had begun overtaking the bed. Then, next to her, there was Brad. He was now almost always trying to catch a look from Christie, as he was now reaching the 500 pounds and forcing himself to grow more for her lover.

And then, beside him, Christie herself.

Phil had promised her it was all going to be fake…But he had simply lied to her.

She was going to grow just as big, if not bigger, now that she was being getting addicted to the weight gain chemical he had also used on the couple. And so, the good Doctor now had three soon-to-be-meals to feed and prepare for the final moments. Angelina was obviously going to be the first one to go…but before that he needed the two of them alive since…
124222333332332322332231313111124.title: The price of being too tempting...

Jump ahead six months, the dream is reality
